<H>{@sāraḷā mahābhārata

<H>{@[prathama khaṇḍa]@}
<H>{@rajacakra@}
<P>baibasuta manu agastiṅki kale pāda pūjā
<P>pādāarghya dile ye manu mahārājā | 1 |
<P>basana kuṇḍaḷa dhūpa dīpa naibedya
<P>nabatana yogāḍa basana ratnamāna sādhya | 2 |
<P>ādyapabong kahila muni dibya rasa bāṇī
<P>śarīra nirmaḷa hoilā taba mukhuṃ śuṇi | 3 |
<P>ẏebe kebaṇa carita puṇa kaleka pāṇḍabe
<P>kahibā he mahāmuni kathāra prastābe | 4 |
<P>pañchu puruṣaku ẏekai yubatī
<P>sāṅsārikā dharme hela tāṅka kisa rīti | 5 |
<P>ẏehā mote sañchapi kahibā tapabanta |
<P>pāpamāna mora hoiba kshaẏānta | 6 |
<P>kathaẏanti paṇḍita mahāgyāṃtā
<P>śuṇa sābadhāne madhya pabongra ye kathā | 7 |
<P1>6--kshaẏānta = pūrṇṇabhābare śeṣa |
[MBO-02(1)-2]
<P>badaẏanti agasti ye paṇḍita mārataṇḍa
<P>śuṇasi sābadhāne ādipabong uttāre madhyakhaṇḍa | 8 |
<P>hastinā rājyare ye īśāna bhāga kati
<P>bhinne nabara kari bije karāile dropatī | 9 |
<P>kointāṅku hiṃ bhinna nabara sehu lāge
<P>pañchu bhrāthe rahithānti driyodhana saṅge | 10 |
<P>makara māsa śukḷayaksha daśamīra tithi
<P>rohiṇī nakshatra ye bāra br̥haspati | 11 |
<P>bāḷaba nāme karaṇa śubha nāme yoga
<P>makara saṅkarāntiki caubiṃśa dina bhoga | 12 |
<P>sedina pāñchāḷī hoile prathama rajabatī
<P>puṣpabatī ucchaba nabare karābanti | 13 |
<P>kuṅkuma kastūrī tahiṃ maṇḍita kari pāṇi
<P>māranti picikārī parihāsye biḷāsuṇī | 14 |
<P>āstāne bije kale dhaumya purohita
<P>prohitagku dekhi uṭhile dharmasuta | 15 |
<P>āśrībāda kalyāṇa karanti purohita
<P>kara yugaḷa yoḍiṇa puchāranti dharmasuta | 16 |
<P>svāmī āja rajabatī hoile dropada dohita
<P>ẏethira carita deba kahibāka tapabanta | 17 |
<P>tumbha tahuṃ mote ke miḷiba bhāgyabantā
<P>tumbho mahāmuni āhe aṭa sabong gyāṃtā | 18 |
<P>ẏethira saṃśaẏa pheḍi kaha brahmabettā
<P>yauṃ yauṃ yoga lagne hoẏe yauṃ kathā | 19 |
<P>śuṇi dhaumya purohite manare haraṣa
<P>aṇṭāru khaḍi kāṛhi koṭhi kāṭi karanti prakāśa | 20 |
<P1>14--miśrita karāile cūna ye haḷadī
<P1>māranti picikā tahiṃ parihāsa bhedi (bidhi)
<P1>13|2 ucchaba = utsaba -- ka, ga, gha, ca, cha, ja, jha, ñja, ṭha
[MBO-02(1)-3]
<P>aṣṭa goṭi koṭhi madheṃ gr̥ha ye śobhana
<P>yujheṣṭhiṅka mukha chāhiṃ bolanti mahāmunya | 21 |
<P>sapatāṅga pāñjiki pheḍiṇa purohita
<P>rajacatra koṣṭhi pāḍanti paṇḍita | 22 |
<P>yebaṇa yebaṇa bidhi ẏethaku nirmita
<P>bidhimata kari ẏebe śuṇa dharmasuta | 23 |
<P>dharma debatāṅka haste naṭīkāḷa phaḷa
<P>subarṇṇa sthāḷīre rakhi aruā taṇḍuḷa | 24 |
<P>rakhiṇa dharmasuta basile turita
<P>kahanti ye rajacatra dhaumya purohita | 25 |
<P>bāra tithi nakṣatra candra yoga karaṇa rabi aṃśa
<P>sakaḷa kathā bichāri kahanti biśeṣa | 26 |
<P>prathamare sāta bāraṅkara doṣādoṣa
<P>kahibā he śuddhāśuddha śuṇa dharmaśiṣa | 27 |
<P>āditya bāre yebe hoai rajabatī
<P>svāmīki roga pīḍā santāna na hoanti | 28 |
<P>somabāre yeuṃ stirī hoai rajabatī |
<P>se stirī svāmīre sadā hoai bhagati | 29 |
<P>maṅgaḷabāre yebe hoai rajakārī
<P>bidhabā hoai aḷape hoai anāchārī | 30 |
<P>budhabāre yebe hoanti rajabatī
<P>svāmīre saubhāgī se hoanti yubatī | 31 |
<P>gurubāre yebaṇa nārī hoai rajabatī
<P>dhana santāna hoai lakṣmīre priẏabatī | 32 |
<P>śutrabāre yebe hoai rajakārī
<P>bahuta putra hoai nohe anāchārī | 33 |
<P1>32-- gurubāre yebe hoiba rajakārī
<P1>dhana santāna barddhuta hoai tāhāri (pāṭhāntara)
<P1>24|2 sthāḷī = thāḷī 28|1 āditya bāre = rabibāre
[MBO-02(1)-4]
<P>yebaṇa nārī puṣpabatī hoanti śanibāre
<P>putra santāna nāśa yāi ẏeka sambhatsare | 34 |
<P>makara māsa śukḷa daśamī gurubāra rohiṇī
<P>māhendra yoga hoilā paṇḍitamāne bakhāṇi | 35 |
<P>bāra tāra candra hoilā pabitra
<P>tithicatra puṇa ye pāḍile grahaputra | 36 |
<P>pratipadā dina yebe hoanti rajabatī
<P>atihiṃ pātakī se chuiṃ ta na yogānti | 37 |
<P>dutīẏā dina yebe hoai rajakārī
<P>putra pautrī hoẏekā svāmīre dina hari | 38 |
<P>tr̥tīẏā dina yebe hoanti rajabatī
<P>aneka sampradhi hoẏe putra yautrī prāpati | 39 |
<P>cauṭhī dina yebe hoai rajabatī
<P>se stirīki chuiṃle doṣa biṣuḷīpāti | 40 |
<P>pañchamī tithire yebe hoai rajabatī priẏā
<P>se storī pratakṣe ye aṭai sataśriẏā | 41 |
<P>saptamī dina yebe rajabatī hoai māninī
<P>se stirīki gheni ghara kale nohi dhana, santāna hāni | 43 |
<P>aṣṭamī dina yebe hoai rajabatī
<P>pati putra dohitā tāra bahuta rogare paṛanti | 44 |
<P>nabamī tithire yebe hoai rajakārī
<P>svāmī nāśa yāi bidhabā hoẏe nārī | 45 |
<P>daśamī tithire yebe hoanti rajabatī | 46 |
<P>dhana jane hoẏe sukhī bolanti mahāyati | 46 |
<P1>43|2 se stirīki gheni ghara kale dhanahāni -- ṭha, anyānya pothi
<P1>rr|2 putra dohitā nāśayāi na upujai prīti (ca, ñja, ṭa)
<P1>39|2 sampradhi = samr̥ddhi, sampattiśāḷīnī
<P1>40|2--biṣuḷipāti = br̥ṣaḷapati | 41|2 sataśriẏā = satyare lakṣmībatī
[MBO-02(1)-5]
<P>yebaṇa stirī hoai rajabatī ẏekādaśī dine
<P>svāmī thāuṃ āna puruṣa icchai tāra mane | 47 |
<P>dvādaśī dinare ye hoanti puṣpabatī
<P>se stirīki chuiṃle stirī hatyā doṣa pānti | 48 |
<P>yebaṇa stirī traẏodaśī dina hoanti rajakārī
<P>patire saubhāgī lakṣmīre ballabhī sehu nārī | 49 |
<P>yebaṇa stirī pākāspaśī hoanti catr̥daśī
<P>bahuta pātakī se kuṭumbe honti trāsi | 50 |
<P>yebaṇa stirī rajabatī amābai dina
<P>se stirīki gheni ghara kale nohai santāna | 51 |
<P>pūrṇṇamī dina yebaṇa stirī rajabatī
<P>dhana santāna hoiba dekhiba putra nāti | 52 |
<P>dhaumya prohite kahile rajacatra kathā
<P>daśamīre hoilā ye nirddoṣī dropada dohitā | 53 |
<P>puṇi nakṣatracatra pāḍile purohite
<P>yebaṇa nakṣatre rajabatī hoile hoai yemante | 54 |
<P>aśvinī rohiṇī puṣyā uttarā phālagunī
<P>hastā svātī anurādhā dhaniṣṭhā ẏete puṇya māni | 55 |
<P>śrabaṇā citrā uttarabhodua sampādi

<P>biśākhā mūḷā rebatī uttarāṣaḍhāre |
<P>rajabatī hele stirī sukha bhoga kare | 57 |
<P>ẏete nakṣatre yebaṇa stirī hoanti rajabatī
<P>ihaloke sukha pāi tāra ante sadagati | 58 |
<P>aśleṣā tini pūbongā dvijā ārdrā maghā jyeṣṭhā nakṣatrare
<P>rajabatī hoile stirī bahuta duḥkha bhoga kare | 59 |
<P>śubha nakṣatra yoge nahiṃ pāpakarma
<P>rohiṇī nakṣatre hoilā aneka dharma | 60 |
[MBO-02(1)-6]
<P>yujheṣṭhi boilenakṣatra catre yebe nāhiṃ pāpagraha
<P>yogacatra ẏebe bichāriṇa kaha | 61 |
<P>yogacatra puṇa pāḍile prohite
<P>samasta guṇa guṇi bichāranti dna arthe | 62 |
<P>āẏuṣvāna saubhāgya prīti siddhi br̥ddhi śobhana sukarma
<P>barīẏāna śukḷa śia sādhya śubha dhr̥ba harṣaṇa indra brahma | 63 |
<P>ẏethe yebe huanti rajabatī
<P>dhana santāna aneka, hoai saubhāgyabantī | 64 |
<P>dhr̥ti ati gaṇḍa śūḷa biṣkumbha byatipāta dhr̥ba yoga
<P>dochārī huanti nārī yebe hoai raja yoga | 65 |
<P>yarigha byāghāta gaṇḍa biṣṭi bajra baidhr̥ti
<P>santāna hāni hoai ẏethe hele rajabatī | 66 |
<P>dutīẏare guru candramā sapatame
<P>śaniścara nabame rāhu ketu ẏekādaśame | 67 |
<P1>61--khaḍi gheni koṭhi kāṭanti purohita dhaumya
<P1>śāhāsra bichāranti paṇḍita uttama | (kha, ṭa)
<P1>66|2 `santāna hāni hoi ẏethe hele rajabatī' ehapare chapābahi `ṭha're karaṇara bichāra achi | kintu ehā anya kauṇasi pothire nāhñ |
<P1>baba bāḷaba kauḷaba taitiḷa bāṇijya |
<P1>ẏe yogare rajotī hele pāi rājya |
<P1>biṣṭiśakuni kiṃstughne āu gara nāga |
<P1>catuṣpadakaraṇa ẏe ṣaṣṭhe pāpa bhoga |
<P1>`kha' o `ṭa' pothire e sthānare adhikā pāṭha achi :--
<P1>yogalagna bichāra karante dhaumya prohite
<P1>kichi doṣa nāhiñ ye bichāra karante |
<P1>āho samasta pāsori bichārile māheśvarī
<P1>śuṇiṇa santoṣa hoile yujheṣṭhi daṇadhārī |
<P1>yujheṣṭhi pachāranti śuṇimā prohite
<P1>pākaśuddha snāna hoiba kete dina ante |
<P1>63|1 āẏuṣvāna = āẏuṣmāna
[MBO-02(1)-7]
<P>tr̥tīẏe rabi budha daśamare achai maṅgaḷa |
<P>kahile prohite sabong śubha anakūḷa | 68 |
<P>ẏemanta bichāri anakūḷa ghenile grahaputre
<P>ucchaba bidhāna ye karanti dinā ṣate | 69 |
<P>rajabatī hoanti yebaṇa yubatī
<P>chāṇḍāḷa chuiṃlā doṣa ye prathama dina labhanti | 70 |

<P>dutīẏa dinare yebaṇa puruṣa chuaṃnti

<P>yāhā se biñcharile dhaumya prohite purāṇe
<P>muhiṃ tāhā bañchāili ṭhākurāṇīṅka āgyāṃ paramāṇe | 79 |
<P>bichāra kale ẏethe ẏete doṣa achi

<P>kete aniryāpa kari kahibi muṃ mānuṣa yonire hoi janma | 82 |

<H>{@pāṇḍabamānaṅkara niẏama@}
<P>makara māsa śukaḷa pakṣa ẏekādaśī tithi
<P>paṇḍitabāra mr̥gaśirā nakṣatra yugati | 1 |
<P>dropatī śuddha srāhāna mukati sehi dibase

<P>bijaẏe pañchu pāṇḍabe ẏekai āsane

<P>yujheṣṭhi boile māgo andhapaṭaḷa daṇḍeka upekha

<P>gaḷāru dhanu kāḍhiṇa pakāilā bhumi
<P>bara māga bara māga bolanti debasvāmī | 39 |

[MBO-02(1)-31]
<P>karatāḷi māriṇa ye hasile pābongtī
<P>svāmī ẏesaneka biparīta tumbhe aṭa ho paśupati | 40 |
<P>sāṅgrāme hāriṇa deba hoila aparīdhi

<P>śuṇa ho dhanurjaẏe bolanti jagatamātā
<P>tote kahibā ẏe svāmīra apūbong rasakathā | 54 |
<P>bābu baitaraṇī nadī tīre śiba nāme nagrī

<P>pañchai badana tāṅkara ye pañchadaśa naẏana

<H>{@indra arjuna yuddha@}
<P>śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
<P>se kāḷānaḷa debatā nohilāka śānti | 1 |
<P>diguṇa teje byāpilā se mauṣadhira āpyāne
<P>bhaẏa kari ghuñchi paḷāile maghabāne | 2 |

<H>{@arjunaṅkara baralābha@}
<P>agnire śaraṇagalā ye catra caḍhei

<P1>826| `ṇa' pothire yantra kabāṭa phitibāra pāiṃ goṭie mantrara
<>ullekha dekhāyāe --
<P1>``pelai kapāṭa se yantra acchi pāḍi'' ehi pādānta pare--
<P1>māẏābatī mantra manare sumarile
<P1>guru mānya kariṇa mantra ādhyāna kale |
<P1>mantra--o aṣṭa betāḷa | tumbha nāma dharante phiṭai kabāṭa phāḷa
<P1>na phiṭu boli kāhāra āgyāṃ |
<P1>śrī māẏābatīṃkara koṭiẏe āgyāṃ |
<P1>oñ māẏābatī dile mantra | subhadrā sumarile mantra |
<P1>phiṭu yantra kabāṭa | diśilāka bāṭa |
<P1>mohora bābu betāḷa mohora bola karibu |
<P1>yahiṃki peṣibi tahiṃki yibu |
<P1>na yāu boli kāhāra āgyāṃ |
<P1>śrī gorekha bīra bitramādityaṃkara koṭiẏe āgyāṃ (ṇa)
[MBO-02(1)-271]
<P>māẏābatīra mantra paḍhanteṇa mahāsatī
<P>yantra kabāṭa kiḷaṇī phiṭilā tatakṣaṇānti | 827 |
<P>tr̥tīẏa ghaḍi prabeśa hoiacchi rāti
<P>dekhiṇa dhanañjaẏa aneka toṣa mati | 828 |
<P>arjuna sohodrā aneka meḷa bhāba
<P>baḍhilāka ratiraṅga aneka prastāba | 829 |
<P>biṣama anaḷa jāḷā aṭai kāma kheda
<P>yubā yubatīra bheṭe aṅge nuāsai nida | 830 |
<P>rati śāhāsre nirjita se aṭai bīra phālaguni
<P>rati rase rasailā nandara nandinī | 831 |
<P1>829|1 ``baṛhilāka ratiraṅga aneka meḷa bhāba'' pare -- ``jha''
<>phothira adhikā pāṭha :--
<P1>biṣama anaṅga laharī kāminī mane kheda
<P1>biṣama anargaḷa kāmenī mane kheda |
<P1>oñ ulluka kuhuka dila rati
<P1>muhiṃ paśai mote kehi na dekhantu dibasa rāti |
<P1>na dekhu boli kāhāra ye āgyāṃ
<P1>cauṣaṭhi siddhaṃkara koṭiẏeka āgyāṃ |
<P1>āpaṇā bāma pada taḷipā dhaileka dhāti
<P1>mantra sumari dhūḷi kapāḷe boḷanti |
<P1>tahuṃ ye debī bāhuḍi āsai dhāti
<P1>samastaṃku dekhinti tāṃku kehi na dekhanti |
<P1>ulluka mantra se māẏābatī thile kahi
<P1>tāhā sumarile se haraṣa mana hoi |
<P1>ẏe mantra paḍhiṇ adebī tahuṃ ye aile
<P1>āpaṇā mandire āsi nityakarma sārile |
<P1>āho caitana māẏābatī mantra ẏesaneka bidhi
<P1>ẏe mantra ye sādhiba kāryya hoẏe siddhi |
<P1>sohodrāṃka hāthare yeuṃ mūḷikā acchi
<P1>se mūḷikā prasāde arjuna sohodrāku bāndī kariacchi |
<P1>svātī nakṣatra śanibāre sāhāṇa malāṅga neba
<P1>trisaṃkaṭa ḍeuṃriā pūroi hāthare bānddhale samastaṃku baśa ye kariba | (jha)
[MBO-02(1)-272]
<P>candrakaḷā bhedilā se pāṇḍaba sundara

<P>bidura sañjaẏe yujheṣṭhi ẏekānte
<P>kahai sahadeba ye thāṭha caḷiyānte | 865 |
<P>svāmī ! banabāsa gale bīra phālaguni
<P>gosiṃha badha kari dvārikāku gale satyabhāmāku ye gheni | 866 |
<P>raibrata pabongte deba karanti ucchaba
<P>ẏemanta samaẏe yāiṃ miḷile pārthiba | 867 |
<P>aneka ksānanda dekhi hoile madhuripu
<P>bahua beśa beśana karāile arjunaku | 868 |
<P>basana ucchaba yātrā raibrata parabate
<P>arjuna ṭhākura gheni bije jagannāthe | 869 |
<P>ẏeka dine śrī jagannātha pucchā kale baḷaāmaṃku
<P>svāmī arjunaku pradāna ki karibā sohodrāku | 780 |
<P>baḷarāme boile yebe dabāka kumārī
<P>āmbhara samāne bandhu hoi ki samasari | 871 |
<P>pañchukaṭake ṭhākura se mānacatrabratī
<P>driyodhana rājāku debāre āmbhara bahuta pīrati | 872 |
<P>baḷarāmaṃka bacana deba bhāñji nuārile
<P>garbheṇa rāga bhari hari tūni ye hoile | 783 |
<P>baḷarāme rāile anādhr̥ṣṭa uddhaba
<P>driyodhanaku gheni tumbhe bahana āsiba | 874 |
<P>baḷarāmaṃka āgyāṃẏe aile dūtakārī
<P>driyodhana rājāṃku ẏe neichanti bari | 875 |
<P>jagannātha debaṃkar amane nāhiṃ triputi
<P>arjunaku sohodrā saṅge teṇu karāile chorā pīrati | 876 |
<P>satyabhāmā saṅgare sohodrā debī yāiṃ
<P>aneka bujhānte ye arjuna kalā nāhiṃ | 877 |
<P>sohodrāra bacana yahuṃ arjuna na kalā
<P>sohodrāṃku māẏābatī mohana mantra śikhāilā | 878 |
[MBO-02(1)-281]
<P>teṇukari se mantre baśa hoile sabongsācī
<P>arjuna sohodrā teṇe ẏeka yoga hoiacchi | 879 |
<P>yadyapi driyodhana hoi yiba bara beśe
<P>galeṇa aneka tahiṃ upujiba upahāse | 880 |
<P>śuṇi biṣāda hoile yujheṣṭhi ṭhākura
<P>tabada hoile śuṇi sañjaẏa bidura | 881 |
<P>yujheṣṭhi boile bidura kaha driyodhana rājāku
<P>ẏethu bāhuḍile lāja nāhiṃ nā kāhāku | 882 |
<P>bidure boile ẏehāra baẏara baẏasa alpa, baḍai darpa
<P>śuṇile driyodhana ye kariba āmbhanta kopa | 883 |
<P>āmbhe rahibā yāiṃ chāla raibrata pabongte
<P>jāṇīle bāhuḍai sinā kurubai nāthe | 884 |
<P>prathame rajastirī yehne kicchihiṃ na jāṇai
<P>prathame sājilā thāṭha bodhe ki pherai | 885 |
<P>rāgī brāhmaṇa ye bacana biarthī | 886 |
<P>yujheṣṭhi bile tumbhe kahila ẏemanta

<P>caḷai kurunātha ratnabeṇī nadī kūḷe
<P>manohara bane rahile sandhyā abakāśa beḷe | 888 |
<P>sandhyā sāriṇa rājā bjaẏe niabakāśe
<P>bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa rahichanti ye paruṣe | 889 |
<P>bidura ye hakāri boile śuṇa ho dvārikāra duta
<P>sohodrāṃku driyidhanaku debāra aṭai ṭiki sata | 890 |
<P>tumbhanta peṣilā dina ke ke thile basi
<P>kāhā kāhā anumate tumbhe hela peṣi | 891 |
<P>rājāra āgare ya kahai uddhaba
<P>rāmakr̥ṣṇa ugrasena nanda upananda basudeba | 892 |
<P>sāta bongśa yādabe samaste āstāne chanti pūri
<P>āmbhaṃku āgyāṃ dile samaste sanamata kari | 893 |
[MBO-02(1)-282]
<P>bidure boile upādhi jana ke dvārikāẏe acchi
<P>anadhr̥ṣṭa boile gosiṃha kari achai bīra sabongsācī | 894 |
<P>śuṇiṇa rājā driyodhana baḍa sānande boilā
<P>arjuna achaiṃ yebe bhalata hoila | 895 |
<P>banabāsa sāri pātha ailā dvārikāku
<P>sohodra thibā dulabha ucchaba dekhibāku | 896 |

<P>se kanyā pare biḍambaṇ ahoilā āmbhe pāiluṃ bārate | 897 |
<P>driyodhana boile sudriśeṇa catra yeuṇa pura karai rakṣā
<P>mānara chāra hoi paśibāra tahiṃki kāhāra apekṣā | 898 |
<P>ẏeheneka aniryāpa kathā kaha tumbha bhaḷi

<P>rājāra bacane samaste hoileka tūni
<P>śubheṇa prasara hoilāka yāminī | 900 |
<P>prabhāte kanakabhadrā nadīre nityakarma kari

<P>śuṇi kāmapāḷa mahātoṣa mana

[MBO-02(1)-283]
<P>yogāilāṭi ki arjuna tohora bichāraku
<P>sohodrā pardāna karibā driyodhana rajāku | 907 |
<P>arjuna boile yeheneka bichāra deba svāmī

<P>ugrasenaku rāi āgyāṃ dile debarāja

<P>pannagānārāẏaṇa se sarūpeṇa diśi | 917 |
<P1>914|2 ``yāhāku heu abaśya pradāna kariba kumārī'' pada pare
<P1>cha, ṇa, gha, ta re bhinnapāṭha :--
<P1>samasta saja karante āditya hele asta
<P1>caitrakeśarī bane bijaẏe kurunātha |
<P1>rudrabeṇī nadī tīre caitrakeśarī bana
<P1>tahiṃra kūḷe biśrāmilā driyodhana rājana |
<P1>snāhāna bhojana ye sarile samasta |
<P1>śaẏana mandire bije kala kurunātha | esamasta pāṭhāntara apapāṭha ||

<P>rebatī boile svāmī hoilā akāraṇa
<P>keḍe bhaḷi rājāku kala biḍambaṇa | 918 |

[MBO-02(1)-299]
<P>bindhanti nārāja ye abicchanne samasta yādaba bīre
<P>mukharāba śabade ye kampanti sureśvare | 125 |
<P>kakaḍā br̥ṣṭi jāṇi śare paḍanti upare
<P>pr̥thibī kampai ye dhāmante pādabhare | 126 |
<P>jhalakanti nārāje bijuḷi trāsa jāṇi
<P>śara garjana ye dhanu ṭaṃkāra bāṇī | 127 |
<P>dhara dhara māra māra śubhmacchi ghora bobi
<P>maẏeṃṣā badha kāḷe yesane ḍākanti bhairobī | 128 |
<P>chatrīṃka bacana śuṇi arjuna mahārāga
<P>arjunaku pacha kari padmana hoilāka āga | 129 |
<P>śāmba gada padmana ye atrūra sātukī
<P>arjunaku pacha kari padmana hoilāka āga | 129 |
<P>śāmba gada padmana ye atrūra sātukī
<P>arjuan katire hoi uṭhile thāṭha dekhi | 130 |
<P>gadā gudugara chela catra kāti
<P>konta khaḍag gheniṇa kope pahuḍanti | 131 |
<P>gobindara putramāne yahuṃ gaḷagāji
<P>dekhiṇa yādaba baḷe ye paḷāile bhāñji | 132 |
<P>śahasranta thoi kahanti nīḷāmbaraṃka chāmure
<P>kāhāra tule svāmī āmbhe karibuṃ samare | 133 |
<P>lakṣe ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra bhrathanta gheniṇa padmana
<P>samaste āborichanti se pāṇḍaba arajuna | 134 |
<P>ke samara kariba se padmanara tule
<P>bāḷuta baẏase śaẏambaraku nāśa kale | 135 |
<P>śuṇi kopa kale deba baḷadeba
<P>ābara tuhi se bhiāilu padmanābha | 136 |
<P>muhiṃ ye aṇāili rāja driyodhanaku
<P>tetebeḷe nasti kimpā na kalu tu muku | 137 |
<P1>132| gobindara putra yahuṃ uṭhile thāṭha dekhi |
<>dekhiṇa yādaba baḷa paḷāile samare śahasranta upekṣi | (gha, ṇa, ta, ṅa, ca)
<P1>128|2 maẏeṃṣā = mahiṣāsura |
<P1>131|2 pahuḍanti = śastra dhari ubhā hoiachanti |
[MBO-02(1)-300]
<P>samadaṇḍa gheni barabeśe ailā kurupati
<P>ẏeṇe lajjā mote ye hoilā apramiti | 138 |
<P>gobinde boile deba śuṇimā saṃtriṣaṇa
<P>ke āna kariba prajāpatira lekhana | 139 |
<P>āmbhe abā icchā kalāiṃ baḍa jaṇe debāku
<P>dhātā srijiacchi ye sohodrā arjunaku | 140 |
<P>ye yāhāra kanyā nemanāhiṃ ki sehi
<P>āmbhara dvanda kale kāryya kāhiṃ rahi | 141 |
<P>badanti agasi śuṇ aho baibasuta manu
<P>barabeśe samadaṇḍa gheni ailā gāndhārīra tanu | 142 |
<P>asaṃkhya senā gheni rājā kurunātha
<P>bije mānagobinda raibrata pabongta | 143 |
<P>ẏesaneka samaẏe tahiṃ miḷile munehiṃ
<P>kauroa rājā āge bāratā yāi kahiṃ | 144 |
<P>śuṇa debādhi deba rājeśvara nr̥pati cūḍamaṇi
<P>durāpada kathāẏe deba hoiba ẏehikṣaṇi | 145 |
<P>sohodrāṃku harilā ye pāṇḍaba arajune
<P>baḷe dvārikāru gheni yāuacchi phālagunye | 146 |
<P>sāta bongśa yādaba baḷa gheni kr̥ṣṇa baḷarāma
<P>arjunara tule durāpada heucchi sāṃgrāma | 147 |
<P>śuṇiṇa birasa ye kauroba ādhipati
<P>yābata kāḷe pāṇḍabe mote karanti anīti | 148 |
<P>āho bhīṣma droṇa bidura tumbhe bujhila kemanta
<P>tumbhe se ẏeka yoga kari loḍa pāṇḍabanta | 149 |
<P>ugrasena basudeba kr̥ṣṇa kāmapāḷa anumate
<P>bichāri sohodrāku debā kale mote | 150 |
<P>samastaṃka sanamate dūta dile peṣi
<P>baḷatkāre arjuna sohodrāṃku harilā dvārikāẏe paśi | 151 |
<P1>138|2 ẏe trailokye lajjā mote karāilu śrīpati | (gha, ṇa, ta, ṭa, ḍa, ḍha)
<P1>140|2 dhātā ye ghaṭasūtra kariacchi sohodrā arjunaku | (ka, ja, ṭa, jha
<P1>150|1 basudeba nanda kr̥ṣṇa kāmapāḷa anumate | (aneka pāṭha)
[MBO-02(1)-301]
<P>bhīṣme boile āmbhe sahadeba mukharu śuṇiluṃ
<P>kimpā āmbhe kanakabhadrā nadī kūḷaru tote bṣhuḍāi loḍilu | 152 |
<P>āmbhara bacana tu ho ye na kalu kurudebā
<P>ẏebe ẏethuṃ kemante āmbhe lajjāpāi bāhuḍiṇa yibā | 153 |
<P>driyodhana boilā ho aṭaiṭi ki ẏemanta
<P>sañchaẏe prāṇatyāja āja hibāka pātha | 154 |
<P>yadyapi rudra brahmā indra āditya deba saṃpākṣa huai
<P>trailokya madhe āja ke arjunaku rakhai | 155 |
<P>caḷāa re thāṭha mora arjuna katiki
<P>bhīmasena kopa kalā driyodhana kopa dekhi | 156 |
<P>bāāna bāāna bhāra gadā beni kare gheni
<P>bīrabara pratagyāṃ se karai pābeni | 157 |
<P>yujheṣṭhi boile bābu raha raha bhīma
<P>arjuna tule sāṃgrama karatni kr̥ṣṇa baḷarāma | 158 |
<P>yābata kāḷe hari āmbhanta karai rakṣā
<P>tāhāra kopa kale āmbhara kisa kakṣā | 159 |
<P>yujheṣṭhi boile bābu śuṇa re sahadeba
<P>śrīhari arjuna beni bhāba ki abhāba | 160 |
<P>karapatra yoḍi sahadeba ye boile
<P>jagannāthaṃka bola śuṇi arjuna sohodrāku harile | 161 |
<P>svāmī debaṃku dulabha yebaṇa dvārikā
<P>arjunaṃka darpe kāhiṃ ẏeḍeka niśaṃkā | 162 |
<P>yadyapi baḷarāme kale yuddha arjunaṃka tule
<P>dhanu catra gadā sahite hari arjunaṃku dile | 163 |
<P>lakṣe ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra aśi suta jagannāthaṃkara
<P>arjunaṃku ābori yādabaṃka tule karanti samara | 164 |
<P>sahadeba tahuṃ ẏesaneka bāṇī śuṇi
<P>aneka sānanda hoile dharma nr̥pamaṇi | 165 |
[MBO-02(1)-302]
<P>bhīmasenaku boile bāṭa kaḍhāa re bhāi
<P>arjunara ta hiṃki chāla yibā bega hoi | 166 |
<P>bhīma boilā driyodhana daṇḍa gheni paḍuacchi māḍi
<P>keuṃṇa katiki svāmī śuṇi phālaguni
<P>pachakati diśai tumbhara se keuṃṇa rājāra saini | 170 |
<P>padmanara bacane pachaku chāhiṃle pārthiba
<P>dekhi ratha gaja aśva nr̥pati kurudeba | 171 |
<P>bahua sambhara ye apramita thāṭha
<P>brahmāṇḍa uchuḷai saini samarāṣṭa | 172 |
<P>naba yojana māḍiye rahicchi saini
<P>ākāśa uchuḷai ye mukharāba dhuni | 173 |
<P>dekhuṃ dekhuṃ camakāilā nr̥pati kauroba
<P>sahasre pura kari arjunaku beḍhile rājadeba | 174 |
<P>śuṇa ho mahārājā arjunara carita
<P>kṣīrodra manthane yehne mandara pabongta | 175 |
<P>kṣīrodra hoilā yehne dadhira nauti
<P>mandara khuā kari yehne debatāẏe manti | 176 |
<P>ẏeheneka kauroba yādaba baḷa hoile bārānidhi
<P>arjuna mandara yehne manthai ye dadhi | 177 |
<P>kurubaḷa thāṭha manthana ye karai sabongsācī
<P>asaṃkhya dekhi biṣāda se hoile śrībacchi | 178 |
<P>driyodhanara thāṭha dekhi se bīra brikodara
<P>kopeṇa dhāmaiṃ se paṇḍaba sundara | 179 |
<P1>177|2 arjunara ratha khuā hoi samastaṃku rodhi | (ṭa, ṭha)
<P1>177|2 arjunara ratha mandra giri, tahiṃki pātha mahāyodhi | (gha, ṇa, ta)
[MBO-02(1)-303]
<P>bāāna bāāna bhāra gadā beni kare gheni
<P>ghoṭilā brikodara se kauroba saini | 180 |
<P>driyodhanara barabeśa dekhi baḷarāme
<P>haḷ amūṣaḷa gheni āpaṇe paśile sāṃgrāme | 181 |
<P>mahābhīṣma rūpa se deba haḷadhārī
<P>pādabhare ye heḷa ghenai basundharī | 182 |
<P>raḍira śabda ghāte trāsile digapāḷe
<P>bidyādara puruṣe na rahile gagana maṇḍaḷe | 183 |
<P>koṭiẏe siṃghara yāhāra parātrama
<P>chaḍa lakṣa yojane trāsilāka yama | 184 |
<P>yahuṃ bhīṣmarūpa prakāśile rāmacandre
<P>dekhiṇa mūrcchāgata hoile saubhadre | 185 |
<P>baḷarāmaṃka bhīṣmarmūrtti dekhi ho bīra pātha
<P>ẏehikṣaṇi ratha tumbhara karibe bhaganasta | 186 |
<P>kehi nabratibaṭi baḷarāmaṃkara mukhe
<P>kesaneke śarīra dharibi muṃ svāmī dukhe | 187 |
<P>arjuna boile sakhī miche noha bāi
<P>ẏemanta kathāre go āmbhanta ki pāi | 188 |
<P>dekha go sautadre mohora paratāpa
<P>ẏekā nārājake bhāṅgibi baḷarāmaṃkara darpa | 189 |
<P>ẏethu anantare baḷarāmaṃka sannadhe prabeśa kurupati
<P>bhīṣma droṇa duheṃ rathuṃ ohlāile tatakṣaṇānti | 190 |
<P>karṇṇa śalya bhurisabongā bāhlika śakuni
<P>samaste praṇapatya rāmaṃka pāda beni | 191 |
<P>baḷarāme boile tumbhe śuṇa ho gāṅgeba
<P>ẏeheneka bichāra ye kalāka pāṇḍaba | 192 |
<P1>186|2 ẏehikṣaṇi aneka roḷa karibe haḷahasta | (ta, gha, ṇa, cha)
<P1>187|1 kehi na bratibaṭi baḷarāmaṃkara ḍāke | (gha, cha, ḍa, ḍha)
<P1>187|1 kehi na bratibaṭi baḷarāmaṃkar kope | (aneka pāṭha)
<P1>188|2 ẏemanta kathāre ki mbhaku jiṇai | (ṭa)
[MBO-02(1)-304]
<P>baḷātkāre dekha ẏe harilā sohodrāku
<P>āmbhe bari aṇāiluṃ driyodhana rājāku | 193 |
<P>bhīṣme boile deba kopa saṃharibā
<P>na jāṇi arjuna doṣa kalā abā | 194 |
<P>kuru pāṇḍaba deba nohanti bhinna bhinna
<P>ye driyodhana pratakṣe se aṭai arajuna | 195 |
<P>driyodhana boilā bhīṣme boile yāhā
<P>mohora tahiṃ thāi pāṇḍabaṃku aneka senehā | 196 |
<P>āja pāṇḍabanta ke karai rakṣā
<P>tumbhara tāhāṃku ho ẏeḍeka upekṣā | 197 |
<P>tumhbe mohora sāṃgrāma dekha debarāja
<P>jībante pāṇḍabanta na thoibi muhiṃ āja | 198 |
<P>driyodhanara bacane boile jagannātha
<P>pāṇḍabanta sāṃgrāme tu kisa sāmaratha | 199 |
<P>khāṇḍaba bana dahana kari jiṇilā amarādhi
<P>agniki toṣa kalā ye deiṇa mauṣadhi | 200 |
<P>pāṇḍabāsura tumbhanta ye karuthilā bhakṣa
<P>se pāntabāsura māri tumbhakaiṃ kalā rakṣa | 201 |
<P>pāñchāḷa deśe ye dropadara pure
<P>dropatīki svaẏambar se kalāka sambhare | 202 |
<P>lakṣe nr̥pati ye thile samadaṇḍe
<P>samasta digapāḷe thile dekhile brahmāṇḍe | 203 |
<P>āho mānagobinda tu nohasi dvandakārī
<P>arjunaku sāṃgrāme nohu āmbhe sari | 204 |
<P>apāra bacana ye bolanti jagannāthe
<P>aneka dhaṃsi hoiba arjunara hāthe | 205 |
<P>ẏe dvāpara yuge hāde arjuna aṭai bhāroi malla
<P>pr̥thīra bhārābhara kariba uddhāra | 206 |
<P1>197|2 mohora anna khāi pāṇḍabanta hoichanti sāhā | (ṭa, cha)
[MBO-02(1)-305]
<P>tārakā sāṃgrāme yehne diśanti kumāre
<P>arjunara mahiṃmā ye tehneka ākāre | 210 |
<P>yebaṇa śara dile baśyānara debatā
<P>tāhā sumaraṇā kala ye arjuna baḷabantā | 211 |
<P>abikṣaṇe bāṇa āsi hoila parāpata
<P>pināka dhanu prabeśa ye māẏābatī ratha | 212 |
<P>agni debatā deithile ratha nandighoṣa
<P>bābu minaketana ture ẏe rathare basa | 213 |
<P>arjunara bacana śuṇiṇa padmana
<P>se rathare basilā ye rukmiṇī nandana | 214 |
<P>samara sambhabong ye dekhāi anaṅga
<P>kauroba thāṭha se ye āborilā bega | 215 |
<P>lakṣe ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra aśiẏe nandana
<P>samastaṃka kare diśai śaṅkha catra cihna | 216 |
<P>śrībhmaje dhanu dhari se nārāẏāṇa baḷā
<P>kopeṇa kumāre ye peṣile śaramāḷā | 217 |
<P>paḍanti nārāje yesaneke ākā śuṃ bajrasūci
<P>baḷarāmaṃku ṣāṃgrāme āborile sabongsācī | 218 |
<P>dekhi baḷarāme chāhiṃle bhīṣmaṃkara mikha
<P>baḷīẏāra chorara ho pratagyāṃ puṇa dekha | 219 |
<P>bhagṇīki mohora ye harilā baḷātkāre
<P>ābara yuddha kari loḍai āmbhara saṅgare | 220 |
<P>kope haḷa mūṣaḷa ye bulāi deba haḷī

<P>baḷarāme pratiuttara dile arjunaku
<P>trailokye pāṇḍabā re āja kehu tote rakhu | 222 |

[MBO-02(1)-306]
<P>pīrati dāsa muhiṃ bhagatamatsaḷa
<P>kaicchā jagajeṭhī muṃ dukhī janaṃka sodara | 224 |
<P>yadyapi baḷarāma tumara āmara pīrati
<P>tumara padmapāde śate sahasra praṇati | 225 |
<P>tu yebe mohora tule hoibu abhāba
<P>ẏekā arajuna muṃ tu sahasre baḷadeba | 226 |
<P>prasanne parama bandhu muhiṃ trailokya bhmabana ghoṭi
<P>duṣṭa nibāraṇa muṃ kaicchā jagajeṭhī | 227 |
<P>arjunara pratagyāṃ dusaha dr̥bhara dekhi
<P>bajra mūṣaḷa bulāile rāma uprodha upekṣi | 228 |

<P>koṭiẏe kabā dhanu dhaile ye rohiṇīra tanu | 229 |
<P>śateka nārāja ye pūroi abicchanne
<P>peṣile kāmapāḷa ye mahākopa mane | 230 |

<P>ākreṣi nārāja ye peṣile puṇa puṇi | 231 |

<P>ākāśe thāi samara dekhanti kautuke | 235 |

<P1>231|2 deba śahasra ye prahāra kale haḷapāṇi | (aneka pāṭha)

<P1>234|2 baḷarāmaṃka śahasramāna ye paḍu acchi bhmabi | (ḍa, ḍha)

[MBO-02(1)-307]
<P>nārada bije kale daṇḍa bīṇā bāi
<P>kaḷi kutohoḷa dekhibā peṭa ye pūroi | 236 |
<P>lāgu lāgu sāṃgrāma ye hou raṇaraṅga
<P>sādhu re pāṇḍabā jībana tohora dhanya dhanya aṅga | 237 |
<P>arjuna baḷarāma śara bindhābinddha
<P>ohobaḷa thāṭhe arjuna mahāyodhi | 238 |
<P>lāghaba śare yahuṃ rāma nuārile jiṇi
<P>deba śasramānanta deba basāile āṇi | 239 |
<P>trailokya ghoṭai yebaṇa nirghāta bāṇa
<P>kope prahāra kale se deba saṃtriṣeṇa | 240 |
<P1>236|2 ``kaḷi kutohoḷa dekhibā peṭa ye pūroi'' pāṭha pare
<>``ka o ṭa'' re bhinna pāṭha :--
<P1>lāgu lāgu boli kaḷi dhokaḍiru pakāile dhūḷi ye muṭhāẏe
<P1>kautuke muni khemaṭā nāṭa kaẏe
<P1>ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra kaḷi munīre pūroi
<P1>niti gheni buluthānti nārada goṣāīṃ |
<P1>se kaḷi muṇiki halāi dhūḷi pakāile
<P1>lagilā kaḷaha mahā kopānaḷe |
<P1>bhāriyā kaḷi, mā dhokaḍi, jhia kāṇḍoī
<P1>pua kaḷaha, āpe kaḷaha gheniṇa bulai |
<P1>238|2 ``ohobaḷa thāṭhe arjuna mahāyodhi'' pāṭha badaḷare `kha'
<>pothire pāṭha :--
<P1>beni jaṇa pakānti beniṃkara śira chedi |
<P1>kr̥tāntaka śara ye māile baḷadeba
<P1>sūryya śara māri tāhā chedile pārthiba |
<P1>kr̥tāntaka śara yahuṃ arjuna ye chedi
<P1>tāha dekhi baḷarāma hele mahātrodhi |
<P1>asra chedante ghenile amoha śakati
<P1>arjuana uparaku binddhale haḷapati |
<P1>anaḷa jāṇiṇa śakatir ateja
<P1>ākreṣiṇa binddhale rohiṇī tanuja |
[MBO-02(1)-308]
<P>jvāḷābaḷī bāṇa ye dhanurjaẏe bindha
<P>rāmara nirghāta bāṇa bege pakāilā chedi | 241 |
<P>rāgeṇa aniryāpa bāṇa binddhale saṃtraṣaṇa
<P>dhātikāre māile deba sahasreka bāṇa | 242 |
<P>kopeṇa dhanurjaẏe binddhalā bajra sūci
<P>rāmara śahasra bābu chedile sabongsācī | 243 |
<P>sahasradhārā nārāja amoha śakati
<P>arjuna uparaku tāhā peṣile haḷapati | 244 |
<P>mahā anaḷa jāṇi śakatira teja
<P>ākāśa teji antara hoile debarāja | 245 |
<P>arjuna rakha boli śubhilā ghora bāṇī
<P>kāḷānaḷa śara arjuna peṣilāka puṇi | 246 |
<P>arjunara śara ye tribhmabana ghoṭi
<P>rāmara śahasra dhāramāna samasta chedilā kirīṭī | 247 |
<P>bhmaja bāṇa boli kari ye anādi deba śara

<P1>ẏehā śuṇi bahmā uṃkarile tuṇḍe
<P1>chāri muṇḍa upare jāta helā ẏeka muṇḍe |
<P1>200|1 kāhāku pachāribā beda kalu tu anīti | (ṭa, ñja, jha)
<P1>193|1 sāhi = sāthi śaddaja, sahāẏa |
<P1>193|2 pāṇigrāhī = mukhya byakti |
[MBO-02(1)-369]
<P>ẏete boli dhātā uṃkāri brahmāṇḍe
<P>brahmā muṇḍa upae bāhāra āreka muṇḍe | 202 |
<P>muṇḍa upare bāhāra hoilā yebaṇa badana
<P>pañcha bakatra bidhātā hoilā bidyamāna | 203 |
<P>se adhika badane paḍhai yogabeda
<P>rāgeṇa caḷile se svāmī sadānanda | 204 |
<P>īśvaraṃka śarīra kampai yogabeda śuṇi
<P>rāga saṃhari nuārile deba śūḷapaṇi | 205 |
<P>īśvara boile, dhātā yugata ki; tohora pañchu badana
<P>naṭakāra lokaṃkara sinā bebhāra ẏesana | 206 |
<P>muṇḍe haranti muṇḍe karanti se jāta
<P>bichārante se puṇa hoibāka sata | 207 |
<P>dhātā boile śuṇa ho mahādeba
<P>ājahuṃ hoibu āmbhe pañchu baktabya | 208 |
<P>tohorapañchu badana sahite kali muhiṃ sādhi
<P>muhiṃ se bedabara nātha ye parasiddha | 209 |
<P>īśvara bacaan dhātā karai abagyāṃ
<P>beḷuṃbeḷa ta baḍhilā bahuta pratagyāṃ | 210 |
<P>mattabhoḷa puruṣa hoiṇa mahārāgī
<P>pitāmahakaiṃ kopeṇa upurodha parityāgi | 211 |
<P>aṅguḷi muṇḍe prahāra kale deba bhmaja daṇḍa
<P>dhātikāre cchiḍilā pitāmahara rurddhva muṇḍa | 212 |
<P>rāge īśvara prahāra kale bāmakara ghāte
<P>cchiḍilā brahmāra muṇḍa lagilā īśvara bāma hāthe | 213 |
<P>uchuḍi pakāile deba se muṇḍa goṭi
<P>aneka bāge tāhāṃka hātharu na galā se phiṭi | 214 |
<P>śūḷeṇa bidāri svāmī karanti khaṇḍa khaṇḍa
<P>tadyāpi na chāḍilā se brahmākara muṇḍa | 215 |
<P>brahmāra rudhiramāna cchiḍi paḍilāka dhāti
<P>se rudhiraru puruṣeka hoilā utapatti | 216 |
[MBO-02(1)-370]
<P>mañcha bhmabane pāda ākāśe tāra mathā
<P>praśasta nāma tāku dileka bidhātā | 217 |
<P>śūnya tini bhmabana ādi kari ghoṭilā brahmāṇḍa
<P>svarga mañcha sahite bistāra kalā tuṇḍa | 218 |
<P>pitāku pucchā kalā tu ye mote kalu utapatti
<P>āhāra dile sinā muṃ hoibi triputi | 219 |
<P>pita dekhāile turjanī aṅguḷi
<P>āre re praśasta tuhi bhakṣa ẏe kapāḷī | 220 |
<P>pitāmaha bacana śuṇiṇa praśasta
<P>īśvara debatānta ghotilā pratakṣa | 221 |
<P>dekhiṇa kopānaḷa ye deba tripurāri
<P>praśasta senāpatiki śūḷeṇa prahāri | 222 |
<P>sadāśiba śūḷaku se ye na kalā kicchi bhrānti
<P>īśvara hātharu uchuḍi ghenilā śūḷa ye śakati | 223 |
<P>se hi śūḷa bulāiṇa ye piṭilā īśvara debatāṃku
<P>bhaẏeṇa rudra debata ghuñchile tāhaku | 224 |
<P>īśvara paḷābante goḍāi brahma datyā
<P>kehi mukha na chāhiṃle hara tu kalu brahmahatyā | 225 |
<P>trailoka bhmabanaru īśvara paḷāile
<P>brahmahatyā doṣaru kehi mukha na chāhiṃle | 226 |
<P>paḷābanti biśvanāthe na chāhiṃ leuṭi
<P>kaṭaḷi brahma rākṣasa goḍāi acchi ghoṭi | 227 |
<P>nirāśi īśvare hoile pādagati
<P>ākāśa bhmabanuṃ ḍeiṃ paḍileka jhaṭati | 228 |
<P>maru śikhe thāiṃ se ḍeiṃle samodraku
<P>samodra bhitare thāiṃ ḍeiṃ paḍile agāda jaḷaku | 229 |
<P>sapata dvīpa svāmī ḍeiṃle ẏekapāde
<P>paḍile nīḷakaṇṭha samodra agade | 230 |
<P1>218|2 svarga mañcha bistāra śarīra tāhāra piṇḍa | (ṭa, jha, ñja)
[MBO-02(1)-371]
<P>īśvarakaiṃ goḍāi khedilā brahmabatsa
<P>sehi ẏekāpādake ḍeiṃlā pratakṣā | 231 |
<P>īśvara ye paḷāile mahājaḷe buḍi
<P>bho biṣṇu nātha rakṣākara boli dile ghora raḍi | 232 |
<P>mahāraḍi śabada yahuṃ kale mahādeba
<P>āsana kampilā ye svāmī padmalābha | 233 |
<P>yoga laẏa tejiṇ aye chāhiṃle anādi
<P>dekhile īśvarakai brahma rākṣasa āṇai khedi | 234 |
<P>śrībhmaja baḍhāiṇa dile deba hari
<P>biṣṇu nātha bhmaja baḍhāi dile yojana sahasra chāri | 235 |
<P>īśvara debatānta āṇi basāile kati
<P>nārāẏaṇaṃka kare catra dekhi brahma rākṣasa kalā bhīti | 236 |
<P>sahasre yojana thāuṃ rahilā thambībhūte
<P>biṣṇuṃka katiki āsi nuārai praśaste | 237 |
<P>nārāẏaṇ asannidhe basichanti biśvanāthe
<P>katiki āsi ye nuārilā daite | 238 |
<P>nārāẏaṇe pucchā kale chāhiṃṇa pañchumāthe
<P>bho īśvara baikulya hua kisa arthe | 239 |
<P>cchidra muṇḍa goṭāẏe ta lāgiacchi tohora bāma hāthe
<P>ẏehāra tadanta mote kahibā turite | 240 |
<P>īśvare boile muṃ brahmāre hoili bibādī
<P>aneka katu bākya mote brahmāẏe sampādi | 241 |
<P>adabhmate muṇḍeka jāta kale kāhuṃ
<P>rāga sahi nuārili kaṭu bacana mote kahuṃ | 242 |
<P>kopeṇa prahāra muṃ kalai bhmajadaṇḍa
<P>cchiḍi paḍilā se brahmāra jāta kalā muṇḍa | 243 |
<P>se brahmāra muṇḍa cchiḍi lāgilā mohora kare
<P>brahmāra rudhiru jāta hoilā ẏeka brahma asure | 244 |
<P1>241|2 aneka kaṣṭhorabākye mote brahmāẏe sampādi | (da, gha)
[MBO-02(1)-372]
<P>se brahma rākṣasa ye loḍai mote bhakṣi
<P>teṇu kari deba muhiṃ trāse paḷāi āsiacchi | 245 |
<P>ākaśe mote kehi nohile rakhantā
<P>samaste boile mote kalu ho brahmahatyā | 246 |
<P>muhiṃ tohora śaraṇa deba dāmodara
<P>ẏehi durāpada saṃkaṭaru mote karibāka pāra | 247 |
<P>hāthe thibā muṇḍa goṭi tuṇḍa ye bistāri
<P>de de boli mote māge āṇṭa kari | 248 |
<P>nārāẏaṇe boile ẏe kisa māgai śūḷapati
<P>preta piśāca rākṣase debarudhire triputi | 249 |
<P>śuṇiṇa śrī nārāẏaṇa catra dhaileka kare
<P>tini gāra ciri dile deba dakṣiṇa bhmajare | 250 |
<P>meru phuṭi yehne gaṅgā yamūnā sarasvatī
<P>dakṣiṇa bhmajaru rudhira bahilā tini mūrtti | 251 |
<P>se brahmāra muṇḍa tuṇḍare rudhira baraṣi
<P>sahasre baraṣe purilā tuṇe litāẏeka na diśi | 252 |
<P>ẏete śoṇite tāra tuṇḍa na pūrilā
<P>de de boli boluacchi puṇi śānti na bhajilā | 253 |
<P>se brahma rākṣasa ye teṇe rahiacchi dure
<P>sāṃgrāma de de boli ḍākai kopabhare | 254 |
<P>brahmā ye īśvaraṃku mote āhāra deiacchi
<P>muhiṃ āśākali tumbhe tāhāku kimpe rakhi | 255 |
<P>āho mahātamā tu yebe rudhira māṃse hebu triputi
<P>ẏehikṣaṇi debi tote tu hoibu śāntimūrtti | 256 |
<P>brahmāra muṇḍare biṣṇura rakata pūroi
<P>īśvara bibhuti tāra tahiṃ bhitare lagāi | 257 |
<P>rudhira bibhuti pitāra muṇḍare lāi medi
<P>chāri caraṇa kari puruṣeka sampādi | 258 |
<P1>255|2 muhiṃ tāhāku bhakṣibi tu kimpe tāku rakhi | (ñja, jha)
<P1>258|2 kara caraṇa kari puruṣeka sampādi | (ka)
[MBO-02(1)-373]
<P>biṣṇura jīra ye sadāśibaṃkara jība
<P>brahmāra jība lāiṃ ye toḷile ādideba | 259 |
<P>brahmāra muṇḍare yebaṇa jība thilā
<P>se pratimā bhitare se yāiṃṇa sambhāilā | 260 |
<P>tini jība nyāsile deba banamāḷī
<P>amr̥ta dr̥ṣṭire chāhiṃle tāhāku nārāẏaṇa toḷi | 261 |
<P>brahmā biṣṇu maheśvara tniṃkara jība gheni
<P>upujilā puruṣe kṣatriẏa mahāgyānī | 262 |
<P>brahmāra muṇḍu jāta se hoilā praśasta
<P>nārāẏaṇa jāta kale yebaṇa tāhāra nāma śasta | 263 |
<P>nārāẏaṇe āgyāṃ dile se śastaku hakāri
<P>se brahma rākṣasaku pakāa bege māri | 264 |
<P>biṣṇura āgyāṃẏe calīlā śasta bīra
<P>ātreṣiṇa ghoṭilā se praśasta mahābīra | 265 |
<P>se śasta praśaste ye hoilā samara
<P>ākāśe byāpilā ye duhiṃkari śvarīra | 266 |
<P>mukharāba śabade se mutha marāmari
<P>samodra hāndoḷai duhiṃkari pada paḍi | 267 |
<P>kare śira tāḍanti doheṃ bhīṣmarūpī
<P>tridaśa debatāẏe tāṭakā hoile tāhā dekhi | 268 |
<P>ẏemante sahasra baraṣa sāṃgrāma hoilā
<P>nāśakara jātakara samasta nirodhilā | 269 |
<P>nityakarma bidhi patana ye hoile br̥ndāake
<P>dib rātra boli na jāṇile debaloke | 270 |
<P>rātra dibā yuddha hoilā ẏemante
<P>baḍhilā mahāroḷa sahasra baraṣa pariyante | 271 |
<P>saṃsāra praḷaẏānta dekhiṇa janārddana
<P>āpaṇe samādhāna karanti deba nārāẏaṇa | 272 |
<P1>259|2 brahmāra jība lāiṃ ye śrijile ādideba | (ka)
<P1>266|2 ākāśe byāpilā ye duhiṃkari śira | (gha, ca, ḍa, ḍha)
[MBO-02(1)-374]
<P>samaste trāsile ye nuārile tāhā dekhi
<P>keśaba bije kale daitaṃkara tahiṃki | 273 |
<P>ẏe yuge sāṃgrāma ẏetekeheṃ rahu
<P>tretaẏā yugaku puṇa thokāẏeka rahithāu | 274 |
<P>duhiṃkara madhye nārāẏaṇa kael bije
<P>raha raha boli kari deba dhaile duhiṃkari bhamje | 275 |
<P>brahmāra tahuṃ ye praśasta abatāra
<P>nārāẏaṇa āgyāṃ dile tāku saṃhara karatāra | 276 |
<P>praśasta brahmadaityaku karatāra dharinelā
<P>dinakara nātha tāhā nei garbhe saṃharilā | 277 |
<P>nārāẏaṇa tahuṃ utapatti hoithilā śasta
<P>nārāẏaṇa āgyāṃ dile ẏehāku sambhāḷa ho puruhūta | 278 |
<P>śastaku nele ye se surarāja deba
<P>bāsaba debatā saṃharilā garhbhedilā ṭhāba | 279 |
<P>hanumāna boilā tu śuṇa ho phālaguni
<P>satyayuge hāde śasta praśastaẏe beni | 280 |
<P>tretaẏā yugare gautamakaṃra gharaṇī
<P>ahalyākai chori śr̥ṅgāra kale āditya bajrapāṇi | 281 |
<P>duhiṃkari garbhe ye śasta praśasta beni thile
<P>ahalyāṃka garbhe se duheṃ upujile | 282 |
<P>indra āditya bīrye upujile beni baḷā
<P>gautama tāhāṃka nāma dile śāmaśīḷā yabaśīḷā | 283 |
<P>chori śr̥ṅgāra ta na jāṇanti muni
<P>āhānika srāhāne gale beni putranta gheni | 284 |
<P>gautamaṃka bīrye jāta ye añjanī
<P>tāhakai tule nele gautama mahāmuni | 285 |
<P>srāhāna sāri mahātamā āhānika sumari
<P>bāhuḍanti mahātamā ye beḷa sātaghaḍi | 286 |
<P1>283|2 śāmatiḷā, yabatiḷā pāṭha dekhāyāe |
[MBO-02(1)-375]
<P>daibe baiśākha māsa baḍa tapata bāli
<P>goḍa poḍilāku putre nuārile chāli | 287 |
<P>śāmaśīḷā yabaśīḷā duiputra goṭi
<P>se putranta srāge kākhe basāile tapaniṣṭhi | 288 |
<P>khaṇḍe dūra āsiṇa ye añjanā boilā
<P>chāli nuārilā pitā mo goḍata poḍilā | 289 |
<P>gautama boile akāḷa kaṇḍa paḍucchi ki tuku
<P>tote kākha kari calāibi ki aṇḍira puaṃku | 290 |
<P>śuṇiṇa rāga kari boilā añjanī
<P>ẏemanta se kahilu tora parā mahāmuni | 291 |
<P>muhiṃ sadabīrye nitānta jāta tora tāta
<P>mote calāi kākhe ghenuṃ caurya putranta | 292 |
<P>añjanīra bacane se gautama maharuṣi
<P>sandeśa pucchnti mahatamā br̥kṣa taḷe basi | 293 |
<P>āmbhe ahalyāra yahuṃ dekhilu sundara paṇa
<P>ahalyāra tahuṃ kāḍha āṇuṃ prāṇa | 294 |
<P>mr̥tu piṇḍa goṭika rakhi basithāu āī
<P>taparu āsi āmbhe ahalyāku jīāi | 295 |
<P>yetebeḷe prāṇa thāi ahalyā śarīre
<P>daṇḍeheṃ na chāḍu āmbhe thāu āśramare | 296 |
<P>āī ẏehimati hoi aneka kāḷa galā
<P>ẏemante kemante se paradāra kalā | 297 |
<P>añjanī boile tumbhe śuṇasi deba tāta
<P>mr̥tu piṇḍa goṭi muṃ rakhithāiṃ nitya | 298 |
<P>indra āditya se āsiṇa adabhmate
<P>indra prāna hoi paśai ahalyāra garbhagate | 299 |
<P>uṭhanti ahalyā ye prāṇa pāiṇa śarīra
<P>icchāẏe śr̥ṅgāra ye karanti karatāra | 300 |
<P1>295|1 āī = āryya |
[MBO-02(1)-376]
<P>bho pitā āditya debatāra yetebeḷe sarai keḷi
<P>ahalyā garbhe yāi paśai aṃśumāḷi | 301 |
<P>indra debatā puṇi karai śr̥ṅgāra
<P>ẏehimati paradārā hoilā aneka bāra | 302 |
<P>se indra debatā ādityara bīryye
<P>tahuṃ upujile ye ẏe beni ātmaje | 303 |
<P>bolanti hanumāna śuna ho phālaguni
<P>bāḷuta agyāna bhābe kahilā añjanī | 304 |
<P>śuṇiṇa se kopa kale gautama mahāmuni
<P>kṣīroda kūḷaku bāhuḍile beni putra gheni | 305 |
<P>āī dekhibāra kathā kahilu bujhibā pratakṣe
<P>dekhi ẏe kathā āmbhe karibuṃ parīkṣe | 306 |
<P>putranta gheni bāhuḍile kṣīroda kūḷaku
<P>se putranta phaṅgi dile agāda samodraku | 307 |
<P>boile tumbhe yebe mohora bīrye jāta
<P>ẏehi sarūpa gheni tumbhe āsiba turita | 308 |
<P>anya bīrye yebe jāta karithiba jāẏā
<P>markaṭa śarīra heu ẏe tumbhara kāẏā | 309 |
<P>samodr̥ bāhāra hoi nuāsa leuṭi
<P>nirāśi baḍabānaḷaku phiṅgi dile tapaniṣṭhi | 310 |
<P>kapi mukha hoile ye se beni kumare
<P>paḍi heṭhabuḍa hoile agāda sāhere | 311 |
<P>ruṣi ḍāka dianti āre śāmaśīḷā yabaśīḷā
<P>mohora bīrye janma yebe āsa beni baḷā | 312 |
<P>mohora manabhrānti phiṭure ẏebe hāde
<P>mohora birye janma yebe mānaba śarīre hua ude | 313 |
<P>apāra ḍaka dile gautama tapodhanī
<P>kṣīrodr̥ṃ bāhāra nohile se nandana beni | 314 |
<P>caturddaśa ghaḍi āsi hoilā dinakara
<P>añjanīra bacana sata jāṇile munibara | 315 |
[MBO-02(1)-377]
<P>mohora putra hile āsanti ninā bhale
<P>sañchaẏe āna bīrye jāta se samodre gale | 316 |
<P>añjanī kanyāku ye ghenile muni kākhe
<P>āśrame prabeśa hoilemuni manadukhe | 317 |
<P>pāṇijhari ẏeka gheni ahalyā ailā
<P>poẏeta naile mora gautamaṃku boilā | 318 |
<P>goutame boile poḍu poḍu stirī jāti
<P>bidhātā kimpe tumbhanta kalā utapatti | 319 |
<P>ẏete bāge rakṣā karithāi anubrate
<P>tathāpi rakṣā kari nuārili tote kadācite | 320 |
<P>para dārāẏe jāta kalu ye putra beni
<P>sandeśa pheḍi āja kahilā añjanī | 321 |
<P>paradāra caurya putra goḷakuṇḍā jārajātakā
<P>se putra mukha chāhiṃle biśvaḷipātiā mahāpātakā | 322 |
<P>bimukha hoiṇa go rāge parityāgī
<P>agāda samudra bhitaraku duhiṃku dilu phiṅgi | 323 |
<P>kṣīrodre paḍi nāśagale putra beni
<P>ahalyā boilā mote tu kimpā ẏehā kalu lo añjanī | 324 |
<P>tohora mātā hoiṇa muṃ hoili dochārī
<P>ālo tu mohora duhitā hoi nuārilu saṃhari | 325 |
<P>abheda ātmā mote bheda karālu
<P>putre nāśagale mote agharabāsī kalu | 326 |
<P>tohora abaśya lo hoiba santati
<P>sehu kapimukha hou tote nohiba prapati | 327 |
<P>gautame boile go tumbhe na karibā roṣa
<P>indra ādityaṃkara caritra ẏe tohora kisa doṣa | 328 |
<P>tohora gyāne ki ānaku kalu paradāra
<P>diapāḷe hoi se na kale bichāra | 329 |
<P1>327| cauryye tohora ye hoiba tanaẏe
<P1>ẏehi kapimukha hou nohu tote āẏe | (ḍa, ḍha)
<P1>322|1 biśuḷipātiā = biśvāsaghātaka, pāpī, hatyākārī |
[MBO-02(1)-378]
<P>satīki dūṣile para gr̥ha bāsa nāśa kale
<P>yābata kāḷaku ẏe kathā ruhāile | 330 |
<P>āna pāpa kale se ānaku nirodhi
<P>paradārā kale se ẏe kebaṇa bidhi | 331 |
<P>ahilyāṃku chāhiṃ muni dile abhiśāpa
<P>pāṣāṇa hoiṇa gaṅgākūḷe pāa tāpa | 332 |
<P>ādityaku boile tu gagana nātha hoi paradārāẏe paśu
<P>ẏe mohora śāpye tote rāhu ye garāsu | 333 |
<P>indraku boile tu harilu mohora patnī
<P>śarīra yāka hou tohora sasrayoni | 334 |
<P>hanumāna boilā tu śaṇa phālaguni
<P>ruṣiśāpye nāśa gale āditya maghabā beni | 335 |
<P>hanura āge pucchā kale dhanurjaẏe
<P>samodre paḍi kemante kale se beni poẏe | 336 |
<P>bolai māruti tu ho śuṇa phālaguni
<P>baḍabānaḷe paḍi heṭhabuḍa hoile bhāi beni | 337 |

<P>tebeheṃ dānaba ye nohilā saṃhari | 103 |
<P>gaṅgāra nandana binddhale śara yete
<P>samasta bhāñji cūrṇṇa helā asurara gātre | 104 |
<P>droṇaṃkara śara sabu biartha hoilā
<P>muṇḍa pātiṇa tāhā asura saṃharilā | 105 |
<P>dhuśāsana gadā ye na kāṭai dehe
<P>bhurisabongā jadyaratha śakunire kisa hoẏe | 106 |
<P>dhr̥tirāṣṭa tanaẏe ye samare bimukha
<P>saini uparaku śara mranti lakṣa lakṣa | 107 |

<P>chāri kṣauṇī baḷa gheniṇa asura goḍailā | 108 |
<P>kodāḷa bulāi se māilā ati bege
<P>kehi na rahanti ye asurara āge | 109 |
<P>bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa ye pachaghuñchā dei
<P>kodāḷa gheni asura achai goḍai | 110 |
<P>paḷabanti kurusāgara na rahanti kṣaṇe
<P>bhīṣmaṃku chāhiṃṇa kahuchanti droṇe | 111 |
<P>chatrī hoi kari yebe paḷāiṇa yibā
<P>kete dūre yāiṃṇa kāhiṃ bā rahibā | 112 |
<P1>110|2 ``kodāḷa gheni asura achai goḍāi'' pare (ṭa) pothire:--
<P1>bāḷaka aṭai ye dānabara bapu
<P1>bāiśi baraṣa āẏuṣa tāhāku |
[MBO-02(1)-520]
<P>hāribā jiṇibā yuddhara ẏesaneka rīti
<P>ketekāḷe bratibā ho asuraṃku kari bhīti | 113 |
<P>rahiṇa yujhiba samasteheṃ āsa
<P>asuraṃku abā kari pāribā nāśa 114 |
<P>bhīṣme boile ho raha raha karṇṇa bīra
<P>asara tule droṇa karibe samara | 115 |
<P>bhīṣmaṃkara bacane karṇṇahiṃ rahilā
<P>kare dhanu dhariṇa se śara br̥ṣti kala | 116 |
<P>droṇa bhīṣma duheṃ ye bindhanti abichanna
<P>ākāśe adr̥śya hoile kaśyapa nandana | 117 |
<P>driyodhana pachārai mantrī śakuniki
<P>dibasa ṣoḷa ghaḍi hiacchiṭiki | 118 |
<P>āditya asta rajanī praẏe diśi
<P>muṃ ẏemanta maṇaiṃ abā prabeśa hoilāka niśi | 119 |
<P>śakuni boilā āho rahi kari dekha

<P>baraṣaṇa prāẏe ye bindhuchanti śara
<P>teṇu kari adr̥śya hoile dinakara | 121 |
<P>mantrīra bacane rahilā kurusāiṃ
<P>asura yudhya dekhi naẏana bujai bhaẏe pāiṃ | 122 |
<P>karṇṇa ye māilā bajrābaḷī mudugara
<P>se śahasra bājilā yāiṃ asura upara | 123 |
<P>teḍe śahasra goṭā upuḍi paḍilā
<P>leuṭi taraki dakṣiṇ bhāge galā | 124 |
<P>śateka asura bāji kari mari
<P>sādhure karṇṇa boli asure praśaṃsā kari | 125 |
<P>kodāḷa bulāi asura māilā niṭhiāi
<P>bhāñjilā karṇṇa ratha bhumire acchi rahi | 126 |
<P>gadāẏe ghenilā nāma tāra dhr̥makheta
<P>asura uparaku māilā ye rādhebara suta | 127 |
<P1>127|1 gadāẏe ghenilā ye nāma tāra dhr̥maketa | (ña, ṭha)
[MBO-02(1)-521]
<P>gadābara paḍante asura hātha pāti
<P>uchuḍi ghenilā tāhā kuṇḍaḷīra santati | 128 |
<P>bāhuḍi gadā gheni māilā karṇṇaku
<P>paḍilā upare kicchi nohilā tāra buku | 129 |
<P>dhanya se karṇṇa bīra kicchihiṃ nohilā

<P>asura upare yāi paḍilā asrabara
<P>ṭaha ṭaha hoiṇa ye hasilā asura | 131 |
<P>boilā pāmara re aṭa āmbhar abhākṣa

<P>tohora beḷe ki āmbha saṅgare kaḷi karu

<P>yāhāra bāpa samare hārigalā

<P>ẏe kathā śuṇimāku aṭai ācambita
<P>bāpa nidhana hele bratai ki tāra suta | 137 |

<P>bāpaku māricha ẏebe paḷāa kahiṃ pāiṃ | 138 |
<P>pañcha yojana yāẏe kehi na rahi aila

<P>puṇi koṭiẏe bāṇa karanti prahāra | 142 |
[MBO-02(1)-522]
<P>niśvāsake nārāja bindhanti lakṣe ghānti

<P>sūryyābrteka śara peṣileka guru

<P>asura śarīre ye bājilāka yāi

<P>aniryāpa samara hoilāka yahuṃ

[MBO-02(1)-524]

<P>ẏeteka bichāriṇa se asura kuḷasāiṃ

[MBO-02(1)-526]
<P>karṇṇaku pacha kari asura ye galā
<P>ẏekā hoi asura hastināku bahilā | 203 |
<P>driyodhanaku acchi rathare pakāi
<P>āsai asura mahā kopabhara hoi | 204 |

<P>saina samasta paḍibāra cintā hoicchi asura
<P>tuhi se nāśa kalu re sainaku mohora | 207 |
<P>daita kahuṃ kahuṃ karṇṇa binddhalā sahase nārāja

<P>bājante asurara dehare na bhehilā

<P>kodāḷa gheni datya muṇḍiāi paśi

[MBO-02(1)-528]

[MBO-02(1)-529]
<P>kāhāra bara pāi se ẏeteka darpapaṇa
<P>mariba ki namariba ẏe asura rājana | 248 |
<P>sahadeba boile svāmī śuṇimā dharmarāẏe
<P>baḍāi pratāpī se kodāḷeśvara rāẏe | 249 |

<P1>tāhāku bibhā karibā ẏe tumbhara dulaṇī |
<P1>ẏehā śuṇiṇa rājā ye baḍa haraṣa hoilā
<P1>chāri digaku sehu ye dūta baragilā |
<P1>dvādaśa baraṣa paryyante dūte bulile chāri ye digara
<P1>kanyā sādriśe kāhiṃ na pāile bara |
<P1>pheri pheri dūte chāridigaru aile
<P1>rājāra chāmure āsi bārata jaṇāile |
<P1>bho kururāja sābadhāne śuṇimā ye tumbhe
<P1>chāri dige kanyā sādriśe bara na pāilu āmbhe |
<P1>yemanta bichāraku āsai tumbhara
<P1>ẏethiki bichāri rājā kāryya tumbhe kara |
<P1>ẏehā kahi dūtamāne hoile mauna
<P1>bisaẏe hoi bhāḷai mānagobinda rājana |
[MBO-02(1)-540]
<P>bharasi rājāmāne kanyā na māganti tote
<P>bhaẏe bhīti tāhāṃkara rahai hr̥dagate | 15 |

<P>trodhabhae miḷile hari baḷarāmaṃkara sannidhāne | 936 |
<P>svāmī śāmba kumara nāhiṃ dvārikā bhmabana caukati
<P>pure pure ghare ghare paśiṇa loḍanti | 937 |
<P>śrīkr̥ṣṇaṃka badanu ẏesanaka bākya śuṇi
<P>mohagate paḍile ye deba haḷapāṇi | 938 |
<P>padmanakai koḷa kari dhaile jagannāthe
<P>boile bābu tohora sakhā saṅge thāi anubrate | 939 |
<P>daṇḍe chaḍāchaḍi tumbhe ye noha beni bhāi
<P>tuhi ta achu śāmba kumara mora galā kāhiṃ | 940 |
<P>karapatra yoḍiṇa se kahai padmana
<P>ājayāẏe śāmbaku muhiṃ na dekhili helā sāta dina | 941 |
[MBO-02(1)-607]
<P>baḷarāme kr̥ṣṇaṃku koḷe dharichanti
<P>nanda basudeba sahite samājanti | 942 |

<P>putra nāhiṃ boliṇa ye moheṇa paḍanti | 943 |

<P>śriKr̥ṣṇa boile ye adabhmata bāṇī

<H>{@baḷarāmaṅka hastinā tāṛana o siṃhadvāra batrakaraṇa@}
<P>śuṇa baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti ye muni
<P>sātabongśa yādabanta rāmakr̥ṣṇa gheni | 1 |
<P>tāḷadhvaja rathe bijaẏe deba haḷī
<P>mahā mattabhare ye kampai mahīāḷi | 2 |
<P>samarthaka laṅgaḷa ye bulāi baḷebara
<P>nicaẏe rāsāṃgata muṃ karimi hastinā nabara | 3 |
<P>baḷarāmaṃkara kopa dekhiṇa badaẏanti nārāẏaṇa
<P>āmbha bacana śuṇimā hou āgahuṃ kopa kimpe saṃtriṣeṇa | 4 |
<P>najāṇi driyodhana kopa kalāka abā
<P>śrīhaste lekha lekhi āmbhe dūta baragibā | 5 |
<P>tāḷapatra goṭiẏe āṇi hari karanti lekhana
<P>yeuṃmate pada āgyāṃ dileka baḷarāma | 6 |
<P1>2|2 mahīāḷī = pr̥thibī |
[MBO-02(2)-614]
<H>{@śrīmukha lekhana@}
<P>jaẏa jaẏa śrī ananta biśvabhuta
<P>sapata biśva bhārabhara bihita | 7 |
<P>sura sanakādi bandita | arka bidhu udita | 8 |
<P>trailokya nātha | baḷe baḷabanta | bitrama siṃgha matta | 9 |
<P>rohiṇī garbha sambhūta | aśeṣa koṭi brahmāṇḍa ādhipatya | 10 |
<P>śrī biśva yogeśvara | śrī anādi deba paraṃbrahma īśvara | 11 |
<P>aṃkuśa dharaṇa nīḷāmbara | caturddaśa bhmabana pratagyāṃ prakhara | 12 |
<P>biśvāsī hitasādhaka | samasta śrīaṅga aḷaṃkr̥ti karaka | 13 |
<P>sura manuṣya maryyādārakṣita abhiṣeka | satya sādhaka | 14 |
<P>utapatti sthiti nāśa kāraka | duṣṭa jana nāśaka | 15 |
<P>bistāra biśrāma garbha
<P>sudhā gaḷita abhaẏa deba | koṭi kandarpa lābaṇya sarūpa | 16 |
<P>duṣṭa jana nāśana | deba kuḷa rakṣaṇa | 17 |
<P>abibekī bihr̥da bibeka dāna
<P>sattva raja tama triguṇa nibongāṇa
<P>sūkṣma bimaḷa maṇimaẏa maṇḍana | 18 |
<P>samarthaka saṃdhāraṇa | uttama saunanda bhuṣaṇa | 19 |
<P>kadambā moḍaṇa | jarāsandha marddana | durbinda bānara nāśana | 20 |
<P>sūta paurāṇika bidhvaṃsana | praḷambā chāṇura darpa daḷana | 21 |
<P>kaṃsāsura nisūdana | abanī bhārā nibāraṇa | 23 |

<P>gomanta pabongta giri maṇḍana | br̥ndābana mohana | 25 |
<P>asatya dhvaṃsa kāraka | tama nāśaka | 26 |

[MBO-02(2)-615]
<P>driyodhana chāmuku āgyāṃ śrīmukha | śrīhasta prasāda santaka | 28 |
<P>ẏehā paḍhi dūta bacana śuṇi
<P>śāmba kumara tule tohora duhitā candrābatīki gheni | 29 |
<P>bahana hoi tu kariyibu draśana

<P1>162|2 ``nāradaṃka bacane pāṇḍabe uṭhile taḍati'' pāṭha pare `ja'
<>pothire pāṭha--
<P1>driyodhana bhīṣma droṇa aśastamā śalya karṇṇakaiṃ rāi
<P1>ābara pātra mantrī driyodhana aṭhāṇoi bhāi
<P1>ẏekā ṭhāba kariṇa se basāi samastaṃku
<P1>bichāra kari bābu ẏebe kahani āmbhaṃku |
<P1>samaste thāi tahiṃ bichāri kahile
<P1>ye tumbhara cittaku ye āsai boile |
<P1>yujheṣṭhi boile āmbha manaku āsibaṭa yāhā
<P1>āmbhe kale na puṇa nāsti kara tumbhe tāhā |
<P1>ẏehāśuṇi mānagobinda bacana bolai
<P1>yāhā tumbhe kahiba se āmbhara sammatai |
<P1>yujheṣṭhi boile śāmba kumar acandrābatīki āmbhe gheni
<P1>baḷarāmaṃka pāde yāi kariba daini |
<P1>ẏeā śuṇi sānanda helā mānagobindāi
<P1>meḍhara bhitaru candrābatīki aṇāi |
<P1>śāmba candrābatī dui jaṇa, saṅge gheni
<P1>driyodhana sahite ye sakaḷa saini |
<P1>gaḷāre koṭhāra dante dhariṇa tiraṇa

<P1>hātha yoḍi kari ḍaka dianti upare
<P1>śarana rakha boli ḍāka śubhilā uccare |
[MBO-02(2)-626]
<P>śaraṇa śabada goṭi ye śubhilā ghora bāṇī
<P>rakha rakha kopa chāḍa he haḷapāṇi | 166 |
<P>pr̥thī na sahai ye tohora kopa bharā
<P>ẏehikṣaṇi rāsāṅgata hoiba basundharā | 167 |
<P>ẏe saṃsāra sāgaraku tahi se naukā
<P>samasta niśodhana tuhi se karu ẏekā | 168 |
<P>śrībaḷarāma baḷarāma ghoṣanti hr̥dadpadme
<P>atihiṃ ākuḷa ye hoile surasiddhe | 169 |
<P>tumbhara kopa kale ki rahiba hastinā

<P>śikhe rahi kari bahuta tusti kari
<P>uddhari dhara baḷarāma boli chāḍiel dīrgha raḍi 171 |
<P>śrīkraṣṇa bijekale baḷarāmaṃka agrate
<P>svāmī kṣaṇaka biśra ma karibā heu ẏethe | 172 |

<P>aneka nibeśi kahanti debaloke | 173 |
<P>aneka baikulya ye hoile dhr̥tirāṣṭi
<P>śaraṇa rakṣaṇa nātha tumbha nāma goṭi | 174 |
<P>tohoreṇa nātha ye bratibe sakaḷa
<P>bhagatabatsaḷa tumbhe aṭa kāmapāḷa | 175 |
<P>muhiṃ na jāṇaiṃ deba śāmba kumara boli
<P>stirīchora boli muṃ aneka dukha deli | 176 |

<P>tumbar acaraṇe deba sabuṃkari sebā | 177 |

<P>pāṇḍabe pāñche achanti ye sohodrāra tule | 1790 |

<P>śāmba kumara tule samaste yibe nāśa

<H>{@kaṭambāsura upākhyāna@}
<P>śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badanti agasti
<P>kopa śānti hoile deb haḷapati | 1 |
<P>yuge yugeṇa se ruhāile kathā
<P>tahuṃ siṃghadvāra batra kale deba haḷahastā | 2 |
<P>śuṇiluṭi ki manturājā śāhāsra saṅgati
<P>siṃghadvāra biṃkā kathā pucchilu mora kati | 3 |
<P>śāmba kumara sakāśuṃ ẏesana prastāba

<P>agastiṃka pādataḷe manu kale sebā

<P>śuṇa ho manurājā badanti agasti

<P>samasta nr̥pati tāku karanti pādapūjā | 7 |
<P>hastinā rājya māḍi basile yādabe

<P>tu deba ho yogeśvara puruṣa uttamā
<P>daśa doṣa aprādha karibā mora kṣamā | 10 |
<P>tu deba baḷabhadra rebatīra pati
<P>aprādha kṣamā mora kara ho haḷapati | 11 |
<P>kanyā goṭi deiṇa muṃ hoili samarpi

<P>bicitra lekhana kari meḍheka bhiāilā | 22 |
<P>rājāra chāmure mantrī jaṇāilā yāiṃ
<P>meḍhagoṭi bhiāṇa hoila gosāiṃ | 23 |
<P>śuṇi bege kr̥taśekhara rājā caḷigalā
<P>meḍhara bhitare ye sabu buliṇa dekhilā | 24 |
<P>sundara dekhi rāja mantrīki pucchai
<P>nohile ki birūpākṣa tora nāma hoi | 25 |
<P>putra nīḷaśekharaku bole nr̥pabara
<P>surekhā bāḷiku nei rakha ẏe meḍhara bhitara | 26 |
<P>poili paribāriẏe jhia saṅge thāntu
<P>nānā kautuke tāra manaku rañjantu | 27 |
<P>ẏemanta āgyāṃ dei nr̥pati caḷigale
<P>kanyāku neiṇa meḍha bhitare rakhile | 28 |
<P>ẏemante thokāẏeka dina bahigalā
<P>aneka deśare rājā bara khojāilā | 29 |
<P>duhitā samane bara kāhiṃ na pāile
<P>pheri dūtamāne āsi rajānta kahile | 30 |

<P>duhitūku bibhā muhiṃ karibi kāhare | 31 |
<P>mane mane mahārājā karai bichāra

<P>niti pratidina rājā mr̥gaẏāku yāi | 33 |

<P>aneka sambhare rājā rājya karuthāi | 34 |

<P>bāṭika bhumiru pañcha cinā subarṇṇa niai lekhi | 35 |

<H>{@dharma yajñara prastāba@}
<P>ẏethu anantare ye bilaṃka deśa rājā
<P>ṣaḍa arghya dei pūjā kale ghaṭaruṣi tanujā | 1 |
<P>muniṃka caraṇe ye namaskāra kari
<P>pāẏe paḍi śoilā karapatra yoḍi | 2 |
<P>daẏā kari kahucha mote śrībiṣṇu purāṇa
<P>teṇu kari kr̥tārtha hoilā mohora pañchupraāṇa | 3 |
<P>asaṃkhya asambhaba śrī mahabhāratha carita
<P>pachāribāku sakhya mohora kāhiṃ tapobanta | 4 |
<P>na pachārile ta kr̥tārtha nohiba mora dehī
<P>teṇu kari prārthanā ye karucchi gosāiṃ | 5 |
<P>thoke ta kahila mote apūbong kathāmāna
<P>nakuḷa kontamune pr̥thī dhaile kesana | 6 |

<P1>48|2 ``mandāagni tāhāṃkara śariru chāḍiyāi'' pāṭha pare `ṭha' pothira pāṭha:--
<P1>caturtha pañchama dina galā ẏehirupe
<P1>āhuti pai anaḷa ākaśaku kṣepe |
<P1>dakṣiṇābartti bhramaṇa kalā śikhā tāra
<P1>dekhi parama santoṣa hele munibara |
<P1>46|2 bābanti = bajānti |
[MBO-02(2)-871]
<P>rātra dibasare ghr̥ta tiḷa yabadhāna paḍiā nohilā
<P>ghr̥ta khāi agni debatā santoṣa hoilā | 51 |
<P>habirbhāga pāi debe santoṣa hoile
<P>yujheṣṭhi debongku bahu kalyāṇa bāñcchile | 52 |
<P>yahuṃ debagaṇe gale santoṣaku bahi
<P>ruṣimāne ānanda hoile tāhā chāhiṃ | 53 |
<P>sabhājanamāne dekhi hoileka toṣa
<P>sapatama dine dharmayāga helā śeṣa | 54 |
<P>agni debatāẏe dekhi hoile haraṣa
<P>pañchu pāṇḍabanta kalyāṇa karanti aśeṣa | 55 |
<P>ẏe pañchu kaṭake śatr̥ māri hua tumbhe rājā
<P>tinipura madhye sabuṭhāre pāa pūjā | 56 |
<P>śatr̥ māri ẏe pañchu kaṭake hua ẏekachatrī
<P>ẏehu deha gheni svargaku yāu yujheṣṭhi narapati | 57 |
<P>sabongdā daẏā tumbhanta karantu nārāẏaṇa
<P>ẏetemate kalyāṇa ye kale baśyānara puṇa | 58 |
<P>rājaruṣi debaruṣimāne ānanda hoile
<P>yujheṣṭhi debongku tahiṃ aneka praśaṃsile | 59 |
<P>agni debatāẏe boile śuṇa ho arjuna
<P>yāhā satya karithilu anyathā nohilā bacana | 60 |
<P>tohareṇa santoṣa ye hoilā śarīra
<P>niroga hoiṇa tuhi thāa cirakāla | 61 |
<P>ẏeteka bara deiṇa agni daibate
<P>antardhāna hoiṇa se gale tatakṣaṇānte | 62 |
<P>ẏemanteṇa dharmayāga hoilā samāpata
<P>munimāne boile śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi naranātha | 63 |
<P1>54| ṣaṣṭha sapatama dine yāga helā śeṣa
<>debe āhuti pāiṇa hoile santoṣa | (ṭha)
[MBO-02(2)-872]
<P>āmbhanta melāṇi tumbhe dia ho nr̥pamaṇi
<P>naimiṣā araṇyaku āmbhe yibu ẏehikṣaṇi | 64 |
<P>yujheṣṭhiṃka kare arghyapātra deithile munimāne
<P>sbhāku gheniṇa se ye caḷile bahane | 65 |
<P>āstānara taḷe se ye miḷile yujheṣṭhi rājai
<P>arghya gheni ubhā hele dharmaṃka tanaẏi | 66 |
<P>yujheṣṭhi boile ẏethe acha debaruṣi brahmaruṣimāne
<P>maharathī rājāmāne basiacha ẏeṇe | 67 |
<P>bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya śakunihiṃ acha
<P>argyapātra kāhaku debā kahibā pratakṣa | 68 |
<P>ẏemanteṇa tinibeḷa ḍākile yujheṣṭhi
<P>boile gariṣṭha rājāmāne tumbhe acha parameṣṭhī | 69 |
<P>nārade bīṇā bajāi ānande hasile
<P>biṣṇu thāuṃ pādaarghya kāhākaiṃ deba bhale | 70 |
<P>ẏesaneka bacana ye nāradaṃka mukhuṃ śuṇi
<P>santharājāmāne śuṇi ānanda hoile puṇi | 71 |
<P>duṣṭa rājāmāne tūnī hoi ye rahile
<P>sabhājanamānaṃkara yahuṃ sīukāra dekhile | 72 |
<P>nārade boile arghya dia gobinda caraṇe
<P>bahuta puṇya arajibu paṇḍura nandane | 73 |
<P>yeuṃṇa pādaku brahmā pakhāḷi nuārilā
<P>caurāśi kāṭhi gaṅgā yeuṃ caraṇa nakha koṇare lucilā | 74 |
<P>tribitrama rūpa ye yeuṃṇa śarīra
<P>dvādaśa aṅguḷi goṭi kāẏā ye tāhāra | 75 |
<P>ye pādare suranadī gopyāna hoilā
<P>lajjā pāi brahmā mauna bhajilā | 76 |
<P>se pāda dhoibāku yujheṣṭhi hoilu bhārjana
<P>pubongjanmara bipāka khaṇḍilu ho paṇḍura nandana | 77 |
[MBO-02(2)-873]
<P>śrīkr̥ṣṇa caraṇe arghya dile yujheṣṭhi nr̥pati
<P>dekhiṇa munimāne ye toṣa kale mati | 78 |
<P>arghyapūjā bidhimāna seṭhāre sāriṇa bahana
<P>munimāne boile śuṇa dharmara nandana | 79 |
<P>yāuachu ẏebe āmbhe na rahibuṃ kṣaṇe
<P>yujheṣṭhi boile abadhana hua munimāne | 80 |
<P>sabongdāẏe mote tumbhe daẏā karithiba
<P>trisandhyāẏe mote ye kalyāṇa bāñcchba | 81 |
<P>ẏete boliṇa yujheṣṭhi muniṃka caraṇe
<P>namaskāra hoile śoiṇa karpaṇye | 82 |
<P>ẏe ante jārāsandha mr̥gasena benirāẏe
<P>melāṇi māgile ye yāhāra rājyayāẏe | 83 |
<P>akṣata bihdimāna ye yāhāre āṇithile
<P>yujheṣṭhiṃ debongku dei santoṣe samaste caḷigale | 84 |
<P>nāgarājā bātāḷa puraku yāuacchi muhiṃ | 85 |
<P>yujheṣṭhiṃ deba tahuṃ aneka kārpaṇya hoile
<P>koḷāgrata kariṇa aneka aṣata tāṃku dile | 86 |
<P>nāgabaḷa gheniṇa bāsuji nāgarāṇa
<P>prabeśa hoile yāiṃ pātāḷa bhmabana | 87 |
<P>nakuḷa āgare se ye miḷile ka yāiṃ
<P>boile thira kari pr̥thī chāḍa ho paṇḍura tanaẏi | 88 |
<P>ẏete boli bāsuki śiragoṭi pātile
<P>kontamuna nakuḷa bāhāra kari nele | 89 |
<P>thira hoiṇa ye rahilā basundharī
<P>pūbong bidhi karmare ye rahilā sambhāḷi | 90 |
<P>śuṇa ho bilaṃka rājā caitana kahinti
<P>ẏesaneka prakāre nakuḷa kontamune pr̥thī dharanti | 91 |
[MBO-02(2)-874]
<P>ẏehā śuṇi manurāẏe santoṣa hoile
<P>chaḍaarghya deiṇa se muniṃki pūjā kale | 92 |
<P>ẏethu uttāreṇa kisa hoilā gosāiṃ
<P>sañchapi kahibā mote toṣamana hoi | 93 |
<P>agasti kahanti tu ho śuṇa manurāẏe
<P>śrī mahabhāratha śuṇi pateka kara kṣaẏe | 94 |
<P>bāsuki rājā se yahuṃ pātāḷa pura gale
<P>nakuḷa se bmabanaru bāhāra hoile | 95 |
<P>bāruṇābantare āsi hoile parabeśa
<P>daraśana kale yāiṃ dharmaṃkara śiṣa | 96 |
<P>namaskāra kari samasta carita kahile
<P>śuṇiṇa yujheṣṭhi deba ananda hoile | 97 |
<P>nakuḷaku dekhṇa ye śrīhari pachāranti
<P>śrīhari caraṇe nakuḷa praḷamba karanti | 98 |
<P>kontamune bābu dhailu tu pr̥thī
<P>sapata brahmāṇḍe tote jiṇantā nāhiṃ chatrī | 99 |
<P>nakuḷa boilā svāmī tohora parasāde
<P>teṇu kari pr̥thī sinā dhaili muṃ hāde | 100 |
<P>bhīma arajunaku ye nakuḷa oḷagile
<P>nakuḷa caraṇe sahadeba ye namile | 101 |
<P>śuṇi tāhā sabhājane santoṣa hoile
<P>kurubongśa śuṇi ẏehā manare bhaẏe kale | 102 |
<P>mānagobinda ye galā hastinā bhmabanaku
<P>samasta kahilā yāiṃ dhr̥ti ye rāṣṭaṃku | 103 |
<P>yāgara bidhāna ye samasta kahilā
<P>kontamune nakuḷa ye pr̥thibi dhailā | 104 |

<P>dhr̥tirāṣṭa boile nuāribi rakṣā kari | 105 |
<P1>105|2 śuṇiṇa birasa dhr̥tirāṣṭa daṇḍadhārī | (kha)
[MBO-02(2)-875]
<P>ẏethu anantare tu ho śuṇa manu mahārāṇa
<P>pabitra āchyāna ẏe ye śrī mahābhāratha purāṇa | 106 |
<P>paḍhante śuṇanteṇa khaṇḍara durgati
<P>rājadvāre sehu ye pūjāpāẏe niti | 107 |
<P>śatr̥ bipatti tāku na paḍai dhāḷe
<P>roga byādhi na lāgai śuṇante śrabaṇare | 108 |
<P>manu kahanti ye caitana śuṇai
<P>ẏethu uttāreṇa kisa carita hoila gosāiṃ | 109 |
<P>agasti boile tu ho śuṇa maharāṇa
<P>melāṇi māgile ugrsena ye rājana | 110 |
<P>sātabongśa gheniṇa ye ugrasena rājā
<P>yujheṣṭhi akṣata dei kale tāku | 111 |
<P>melāṇi hoiṇa tahuṃ ugrasena galā
<P>mathurā pure yaiṃṇa prabeśahoilā | 112 |
<P>baḷarame boile ho āmbhe yibuṃ caḷi
<P>sātadina hoilā āmbhe ailu rājya chāḍi | 113 |
<P>baḷarāmakaiṃ yujheṣṭhideba namaskāra kale
<P>chaḍaarghya deiṇa ye caraṇe namile | 114 |
<P>śrihari putramānanta gheniṇa baḷarāme gale
<P>dvārābatī bhmabane yāiṇa hoile | 115 |
<P>dropada rājā boile yujheṣṭhiṃki chāhiṃ
<P>melāṇi dia muku muṃ yibaiṃ bega hoi | 116 |

<P>namaskāra kariṇa caraṇe namile | 117 |
<P>kalyāṇa kariṇa se dropada rājā gale

<P>bhānumata rājā tahiṃ yujheṣṭhiṃki chāhiṃṇa
<P>boile melāṇi āmbhanta dia kṣehikṣaṇa | 119 |
<P1>106|2 āchyāna = ākhyāna |
[MBO-02(2)-876]
<P>bahuta akṣata bhānumata rajānta dei
<P>melāṇi dile ye yujheṣṭhi narasāiṃ | 120 |
<P>melāṇi pāi bhānumata rājye yāiṃ hoile parabeśa

<P>gobindaṃka bacane yujheṣṭhi boile śuṇa

<P>ẏethu anantare prabhma nārāẏaṇa

<P1>132|2 chāribhāi gobindaṃka caraṇe nimile | (kha)
[MBO-02(2)-877]
<P>kalyāṇa kariṇa ye caḷile bhagabāna
<P>prabeśa hoile yāiṃ kuśasthāḷī bhmabana | 133 |
<P>garuḍuṃ uturi hari bhitaraku gale
<P>rukmiṇī satyabhāmā mūḷe aṣṭapāṭabongśī draśana āsi kale | 134 |
<P>yāgara carita sabu kahile dāmodara

<P>śuṇi pāṭabongśīmāne haraṣa hoile

<P>gobind anicinteṇa dvārikāre rahile
<P>ẏethu anantare manu pachārile | 137 |

<P>ẏehāpare helā yebaṇa kāraṇa | 140 |
<P>kaha muni mote toṣa citta hoi

<P>durgati khaṇḍanī mā go kamaḷa āsanī

<P>jaẏa jaẏa sabongmaṅgaḷa go saṃkaṭa tāriṇī
<P>kākaṭapura māḍiṇa go basichu gosāmaṇī | 146 |
[MBO-02(2)-878]
<P>prācīnadī tīre pūbong koṇe sthiti
<P>nityeheṃ poḍhua bodābaḷi khāu bhagabatī | 147 |
<P>rājāghare tote ye bhoga khañjā nāhiṃ
<P>saṃksāra janaku go moho khāu tuhi | 148 |
<P>maiṃṣāsura nāśagalā tohora buddhibaḷe
<P>rakatabīryyaku bhakṣilu pakāi khapare | 149 |

<P>mūhiṃ ye araṣita aṭai sāroḷa caṇḍī dāsa

<H>{@śobhābatī haraśa@}
<P>bandai bākyadebī go brahmāra dulaṇī
<P>yāhāra nāma goṭi sugyaṃjane bakhāṇi | 1 |
<P>smastaṃka kaṇṭhare go basithāu māẏe
<P>kahiṇa deuthāu basiṇa hr̥daẏe | 2 |
<P>tohora sudaẏā mā go yāhātahiṃ nāhiṃ
<P>jagatare sehi prāṇī pūjita nohai | 3 |
<P>tohora yāhāṭhāre mā go sudaẏā achai
<P>jaḷa theḷe analḷe mahābhaẏa kicchi nāhiṃ | 4 |
<P>muhiṃ mā go arakṣita mote daẏā kalu
<P>kaṇṭhare basi ṇahābhāratha bakhāṇilu | 5 |
<P>ẏeṇīki pada ye pada mote nohucchi go dr̥śya
<P>apaṇḍita loke mote karibe upahasya | 6 |
<P>mūrkha janamānanta muṃ bahuta ḍarai
<P>sādhu janamānaṃka caraṇe acchi dhyāẏi | 7 |
<P>śrī bākyadebīṃkara caraṇa kamaḷe
<P>kabi sāroḷā dāsa namaiṃ sabongkāḷe | 8 |
<P>bilaṃka deśara rājā ye aṭai manurāẏe
<P>agastiṃka caraṇare bahuta binaẏe | 9 |
<P>śuṇili mahābhāratha tumbhara parasāde
<P>nānā durgatiru muhiṃ taribaiṃ hāde | 10 |
<P>nānādi pātaka ẏe aṅgaru chaḍāili
<P>śāmba candrābatīṃkara bibāha śuṇili | 11 |
<P>kumbhaka daita badha śuṇili śrabaṇe
<P>kathāẏe pachāribi hoibā sabadhāne | 12 |
<P>śāmba kumara candrābatīki bibhā hele
<P>ābara putramāne puṇa kebaṇa kr̥tya kale | 13 |
<P1>3|1 yāhātahiṃ = yāhāṭhāre |
[MBO-02(2)-881]
<P>śrīkr̥ṣṇaṃkara putramāne aṭanti baḷīẏāra

<H>{@śobhābatīra bibāha@}
<P>ẏethu anantare rājā tu śuṇa dibyarasa
<P>śobhābatī kanyāku bahana kariṇa dibya beśa | 1 |
<P>baraṇa pūjābidhi samasta sārile
<P>baraku nei bedī upare basāile | 2 |
<P>subarṇṇa pīḍhā upare basiel kumāra
<P>baraṇa bidhānamāna se sārile tatapara | 3 |
<P>satyabākya karma sāri bara pāda dhoi
<P>abhyadaẏika śrāddha kautuka sūtra baḍhāi | 4 |
<P>labaṇa cauṃrī kanyā pakāiṇa dilā
<P>kanyāra bhāi puṇa bara pada pakhāḷilā | 5 |
<P>kanyāku tahuṃ beśa beśana karāi
<P>bedīra upareṇa ye basāile nei | 6 |
<P>br̥haspati thāiṇa ye baraṇabidhi kale
<P>amaḷāṇa bastramāna āṇi pindhāile | 7 |
<P>pūbong mukha hoiṇa se basile kumāra
<P>kanyāku koḷe dhari basile sunāśīra | 8 |
<P>kumaraku koḷe ye dhariṇa nārāẏaṇa
<P>huḷahuḷi dianti ahio nārīgaṇa | 9 |
<P>pārijāta puṣyanei mathāreṇa dile
<P>bara kanyāṃkara hātha neiṇa yoḍile | 10 |
<P>mantra paḍhiṇa kuśa bandhana ye kari
<P>śaṅkhe jaḷa deiṇa br̥haspati pachāri | 11 |
[MBO-02(2)-945]
<P>ki ki yautuka tumbhe deba ho śacīnātha
<P>śaṅkhe pāṇi toḷiṇa dia he turita | 12 |

<P>manare aneka yautuka bichāraṇa kaẏe | 13 |
<P>thāḷī ābara ye gaḍuā ginā yāẏe

<P1>353|2 ``āmbhara rājyaku bāhilā nr̥pabara'' pare `ṭha' pothire bhinna pāṭha :--
<P1>nārada muni kaḍhāuchanti āge bāṭa
<P1>bana pabongta pūricchi asurara thāṭha |
<P1>pr̥thibī bhamilā tāku nohile ke sama
<P1>bahuta jāṇai kūṭa kapaṭa sāṃgrāma |
<P1>nāradaṃka kathāre se āsuacchi peli
<P1>tohora rājyaku nāśa kariba se kāri |
<P1>bichāriṇa kāryya kara āho nr̥pabara
<P1>pr̥thīdebī bhaẏe kampe hoi tharahara |
<P1>udaṇḍa pāṭachatra ye uḍai apāra
<P1>saṅgatare ghoḍa hātī achanti ābara |
<P1>ḍagarā mukharu ẏemanta śuṇi nr̥pamaṇi
<P1>pratagyāṃmāna karai kope śirajhuṇi |

<P>āmbhara thāṭha sanya gheniṇa sajahua
<P>khaṇāra ẏe pākha ye āboriṇa thāa | 20 |
<P>pabongta āḍaku ho karithāa piṭhi
<P>tāhāra sanyaṃku ho deithāa dr̥ṣṭi | 21 |

<P>śuṇa āho manurājā daibara kr̥ta

<P>khaṇāra chāripākhe gheri rahile yahuṃ thāṭha
<P>nagrare paśi ta se na pāile bāṭa | 25 |
<P>nāradaṃku chāhiṃ ye boilā proḍhāsura
<P>ki buddhi karibā ẏebe kaha ho munibara | 26 |
<P>ẏe khaṇā keḍe gabhīra tadanta na jāṇili
<P>ẏe kr̥takeśīki muṃ ye jiṇi naārili | 27 |
<P>nārade boile kicchi na bhāḷa ho rāẏe
<P>mohora tahiṃki achai ẏekai upāẏe | 28 |
<P>upāẏa prakāre muṃ haribaiṃ ẏehuṃ jaḷa
<P>ẏe kathāku cintā tu na kara mahīpāḷa | 29 |
<P>śoṣaṇa mantra goṭiẏe nārade paḍhile
<P>kṣaṇaka bhitare sehi jaḷahiṃ śoṣile | 30 |
<P>śukhilāka jaḷa ye khaṇā hoilāka thaḷa

<P>nārada muniṃku bahuta praśaṃsā ye kalā | 32 |

<H>{@proḍhāsura badha@}
<P>agasti bolanti śuṇa manu daṇḍadhara
<P>ẏethu anantare helā yebaṇa bichāra | 1 |
<P>indra br̥haspati brahmāẏe svarge basithile
<P>proḍhāsura digabije śuṇiṇa bhāḷale | 2 |
<P>indra pachāranti brahmāṃka mukha chāhiṃ
<P>proḍhāsura bhaẏe svarge nuāribā rahi | 3 |
<P>baḍāi durbhāra se ye aṭai asura
<P>kaha jagatara pitā kisa karibā bichāra | 4 |
<P>pr̥thibīki kāḷāntaka hoilā drapiṣṭha
<P>rābaṇa tahuṃ baḍa hoilā gariṣṭha | 5 |
<P>mañcha pātāḷa rājānta jiṇilāka bhale
<P>āu ki svargapura rahiba tāhāra dhāḍi dile | 6 |
<P>śūṇi śatrarāẏe tāṃku kahai bichāri
<P>kāhāra hāthare mariba se kaha kuśadhārī | 7 |
<P>brahmāẏe boile br̥haspatiṃki pachāra
<P>tebe jāṇimānā kathā tadanta bichāra | 8 |
<P>indra pachāranti br̥haspati ye kahanti
<P>khaḍi pakāiṇa se ye manare hasanti | 9 |
<P>indra pachāranti tumbhe hasila guru he

<P1>158|2 ``sabhāmaṇḍopa maṇḍāa boli bhr̥tyaku āgyāṃ dile'' pare
<>(kha) pothire adhikā pāṭha
<P1>āgyāṃ paramāṇe ye sebakamāne gale |
<P1>sudharmā sabhā goṭiki yatane maṇḍile |
[MBO-02(2)-1010]
<P>bhitare śatrarāẏe muṇohi sarile
<P>amr̥ta pānare sehu ātmā toṣakale | 160 |
<P>sudharmā sabhāre ye bijekale yāiṃ
<P>brahmā br̥haspati ye ale caḷāi | 161 |
<P>īśvara pabana duheṃ ye aile saṅga hoi
<P>tetiśa koṭi debatā ye yāha āstāne basielka yaiṃ | 162 |
<P>indra mukharu yuddhā bāratā śuṇile
<P>samaste tahiṃre ye toṣamana hele | 163 |
<P>asura hata śuṇi samaste haraṣa
<P>yahuṃ pr̥thībhāra hoilā uśvāsa | 164 |
<P>svargara apakṣarī nācanti sukha pāi
<P>vargara ānanda ye kahile na sarai | 165 |
<P>agasti kahanti tu ho manurāẏe śuṇa
<P>ẏe prakāre proḍhāsura pāilā maraṇa | 166 |
<P>śuṇiṇa bilaṃka deśara daṇḍadhara
<P>muniṃki namaskāra karai śatebāra | 167 |
<P>tāhāra putra ye moḍhāsura thilā
<P>pitāra maraṇa śuṇi se kisa bichārilā | 168 |
<P>rājā pachārante ye kahanti munibara

<P>mantrī kahilā raja samare padilā
<P>hāthī rathī aneka indra nāśakalā | 171 |

<P>moḍhāsuraku rājā karibāra pāiṃ | 172 |
[MBO-02(2)-1011]
<P>pitāra maraṇa bāratā pāiṇa moḍhāsura

<P>mantrī boilā tu trodhakara śānti

<P>pātra sāmanta gheni nr̥pati hoilā

<P>aneka sukhare sehu rājya karuthāi

<P>sañchapi śiṇiluṭiki tu ho manu mahārāṇa

<P>bandai jagannātha jagata uddharaṇa

<P>daẏānidhi nāma puṇi aṭai yāhāra
<P>daridrajanaṃkara ye aṭai sodara | 179 |

<P>baibasuya manu ye agastiṃka caraṇe

<P>br̥haspati boile mātaḷi yāa begahoi

<P1>442|1 ``svargare paśi debatāṃka saṅge se yujhai'' pare `kha' pothire

<P>bijuḷira jhaṭaka prāẏe śahasre gagane diśanti
<P>megha ghaḍaghaḍi prāẏeka śabada karanti | 556 |
<P>ẏekara bindhante ye tāhā āreka nibārai
<P>kāhāri śahasra kāhāri aṅgare na bājai | 557 |
<P>beḷuṃbeḷa samara ye hoilā apāra
<P>duheṃ mahachatrī na ghuñchanti sāṃgrāmara | 558 |
<P>beḷa pahaḍaka ṭhāru sāṃgrāma ghora kale

<P>kāṇḍare nakuḷa śarīra hoilāni chāi

<P>nakuḷa yete śasra mantri kopeṇa binddhalā

<P>sāṃgrāma karu karuṃ aruṇa udaẏa hoẏe | 562 |
<P>tīkha śahasreka nakuḷa mantra lā

<P>beka saḷakhare bāji gaḷiglā yahuṃ

<P>bhūmire paḍilā yāi asura muṇḍagoṭi
<P>puṇi yāi śira tāra lāgila pālaṭi | 570 |
<P>dekhiṇa nakuḷa ye mahākopa kalā

<H>{@nakuḷa śire pāṭabandhana@}
<P>śuṇa ho bilaṃka rāẏe badanti agasti

<P>asura maribā dekhi nārade bāhuḍile
<P>sudharmā sabhāẏe sehu yāiṇa miḷile | 2 |

[MBO-02(2)-1079]
<P>br̥ṣabha bāhāne ye ḍambaru bajāi
<P>kapiḷāsa kandaru biśvanātha āsai | 12 |

<H>{@nārakāsura badha o pārijāta haraṇa@}
<P>ẏethu anantare ye bilaṃka deśa rājā
<P>agasti muniṃka caraṇe kalā dibya pūjā | 1 |
<P>gandha puṣya naibedya chāmure dile nei
<P>karapatra yoḍi bolai binoẏī bhāba hoi | 2 |
<P>bho muni boilu ye debadatta ailā kāhiṃ
<P>ẏethi uttāreṇa kisa kalā śacīsāiṃ | 3 |
<P>nārakāsura badha kemante kale catrapāṇi
<P>ẏe kathā sañchapi mote kahibā mahāmuni | 4 |
<P>rājāra bacane ye kahanti agasti yati
<P>śuṇa tu sābadhāne bilaṃka deśara napati | 5 |
<P>yemanta prakāre bibhā hoile aṣṭapāṭabongśī

<P>ẏehānta āṇile hari nārakāsura māri | 7 |

<P>baruṇatahuṃ se kanaka chatra daṇḍa nilā

<P>seṭhāre deba indra yāiṃṇa bheṭile | 13 |

[MBO-02(2)-1117]

[MBO-02(2)-1118]
